    "billingCity": {
      "format": "text",
      "caption": "City"
    }
  }
}

HTTP status code 400

Headers

  • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

HTTP status code 401

Headers

  • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

HTTP status code 403

Headers

  • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

HTTP status code 404

Headers

  • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

HTTP status code 429

Headers

  • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

Body

Type: application/json

HTTP status code 500

Headers

  • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

/accounts/{id} get post delete

A single account in PlanMill.

get

View details of single account. See accounts/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

post

Update an existing resource account to PlanMill. See accounts/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

delete

Remove a account from PlanMill

get /accounts/{id}

View details of single account. See accounts/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

Secured by oauth_2.0

PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • id: required (string)

Headers

  • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

    See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

    nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

    timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

    signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

    Example:

    user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
  • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

    Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

    Example:

    EUR

HTTP status code 200

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
  "lineOfBusiness": null,
  "shippingCity": "Helsinki",
  "businessId": "123456",
  "vatId": "852645",
  "invoiceEmail": "invoice_email@planmill.com",
  "shippingPostalCode": 13233,
  "type": 100,
  "blog": "http://www.blog.com",
  "twitter": "http://www.twitter.com",
  "shippingCountry": 73,
  "invoiceChannel": 22,
  "rfReferenceNumber": 0,
  "billingCountry": 73,
  "id": 4635,
  "fax": "+358-46-333605",
  "supplierAccount": 353,
  "billingState": "",
  "serviceLevel": 0,
  "eInvoiceAddress": 123456,
  "autoReplyRequestMails": 1,
  "combineInvoices": 0,
  "reverseCharge": 10,
  "phone": "+358-46-334605",
  "name": "Test Account",
  "billingReference": "Finance Department",
  "shippingState": "",
  "termsOfPayment": 0,
  "billingLocationId": 4632,
  "handlingFee": 10,
  "invoiceVat": 24,
  "description": "<p>test description</p>",
  "shippingLocationId": 4633,
  "industry": 100000,
  "parentAccount": null,
  "ceo": "Hannu",
  "parentAccountName": null,
  "shippingReference": "HR department",
  "turnover": 100000,
  "email": "email@planmill.com",
  "owner": 4891,
  "website": "http://www.planmill.com",
  "facebook": "http://www.facebook.com",
  "staff": null,
  "passive": 0,
  "invoiceNetOperator": 210,
  "billingPostalCode": 00500,
  "firstInvoiceNumber": 3000,
  "shippingAddress": "Siltasaarenkatu 18",
  "billingAddress": "Hämeentie 19",
  "billingCity": "Helsinki"
}

HTTP status code 400

Headers

  • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

HTTP status code 401

Headers

  • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

HTTP status code 403

Headers

  • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

HTTP status code 404

Headers

  • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

HTTP status code 429

Headers

  • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

Body

Type: application/json

HTTP status code 500

Headers

  • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

post /accounts/{id}

Update an existing resource account to PlanMill. See accounts/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

Secured by oauth_2.0

PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • id: required (string)

Headers

  • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

    See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

    nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

    timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

    signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

    Example:

    user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
  • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

    Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

    Example:

    EUR
  • Content-Type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Example:

    application/json;charset=UTF-8

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "description": "base schema for all account entities",
  "oneOf": [
    {
      "type": "array",
      "items": { "$ref": "#/definitions/accountArray" }
    },
    {
      "$ref": "#/definitions/accountSingle"
    }
  ],
  "definitions": {
    "accountArray": {
      "required": ["name"],
      "additionalProperties": false,
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Internal ID of an account"
        },
        "name": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Name of Account"
        },
        "passive": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Active or passive state of account"
        },
        "owner": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Responsible id of an account"
        },
        "type": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Type of an account"
        },
        "vatId": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "VAT id of an account"
        },
        "businessId": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Business id of an account"
        },
        "termsOfPayment": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Terms of payment of an invoice"
        },
        "phone": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Phone number of an account"
        },
        "fax": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Fax number of an account"
        },
        "website": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Website of an account"
        },
        "email": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Email address of an account"
        },
        "parentAccount": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Parent id of an account"
        },
        "industry": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": ""
        },
        "serviceLevel": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Service level provided to real company linked to an account"
        },
        "customerSatisfaction": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": ""
        },
        "description": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Description of an account"
        },
        "autoReplyRequestMails": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Auto-reply request mails"
        },
        "invoiceChannel": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Methods of delivery of invoices"
        },
        "invoiceTemplate": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Invoice XSL"
        },
        "invoiceVat": {
          "type": ["number", "null"],
          "description": "VAT on an invoice of an account"
        },
        "invoiceNetOperator": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": ""
        },
        "eInvoiceAddress": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Party identification number"
        },
        "handlingFee": {
          "type": ["number", "null"],
          "description": "Handling fee of an account"
        },
        "invoiceEmail": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Invoice delivery email"
        },
        "supplierAccount": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Supplier id of an account"
        },
        "invoiceDelayInterest": {
          "type": ["number", "null"],
          "description": ""
        },
        "reverseCharge": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": ""
        },
        "linkedIn": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "LinkedIn name of an account"
        },
        "twitter": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Twitter name of an account"
        },
        "facebook": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Facebook name of an account"
        },
        "blog": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Blog address of an account"
        },
        "firstInvoiceNumber": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": ""
        },
        "googleCalendar": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": ""
        },
        "combineInvoices": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": ""
        },
        "rfReferenceNumber": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": ""
        },
        "lineOfBusiness": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": ""
        },
        "staff": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": ""
        },
        "turnover": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": ""
        },
        "activeContacts": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": ""
        },
        "billingAddress": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Invoice billing address of an account"
        },
        "billingCity": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Invoice billing city of an account"
        },
        "billingCountry": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Invoice billing country of an account"
        },
        "billingPostalCode": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Invoice billing postal code of an account"
        },
        "created": {
          "type": "string",
          "pattern": "(\\d{4})-([0][1-9]|[1][0-2])-([0][1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|[3][0-1])T([0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]).(\\d{3})((\\+|\\-)([0-9]|[0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3])([0-5][0-9]))"
        },
        "createdBy": {
          "type": ["string", "integer", "null"],
          "description": ""
        },
        "modified": {
          "type": "string",
          "pattern": "(\\d{4})-([0][1-9]|[1][0-2])-([0][1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|[3][0-1])T([0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]).(\\d{3})((\\+|\\-)([0-9]|[0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3])([0-5][0-9]))"
        },
        "modifiedBy": {
          "type": ["string", "integer", "null"],
          "description": ""
        },
        "ownerName": {
          "type": ["string", "integer", "null"],
          "description": ""
        },
        "parentAccountName": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": ""
        },
        "revenueThisYear": {
          "type": ["number", "null"],
          "description": ""
        },
        "revenueLastYear": {
          "type": ["number", "null"],
          "description": ""
        },
        "shippingAddress": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Invoice shipping address of an account"
        },
        "shippingCity": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Invoice shipping city of an account"
        },
        "shippingCountry": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Invoice shipping country of an account"
        },
        "shippingPostalCode": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Invoice shipping postal code of an account"
        },
        "supplierAccountName": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Account name of supplier"
        }
      }
    },
    "accountSingle": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": ["name"],
      "additionalProperties": false,
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Internal ID of an account"
        },
        "name": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Name of Account"
        },
        "passive": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Active or passive state of account"
        },
        "owner": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Responsible id of an account"
        },
        "type": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Type of an account"
        },
        "vatId": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "VAT id of an account"
        },
        "businessId": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Business id of an account"
        },
        "termsOfPayment": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Terms of payment of an invoice"
        },
        "phone": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Phone number of an account"
        },
        "fax": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Fax number of an account"
        },
        "website": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Website of an account"
        },
        "email": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Email address of an account"
        },
        "parentAccount": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Parent id of an account"
        },
        "industry": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": ""
        },
        "serviceLevel": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Service level provided to real company linked to an account"
        },
        "customerSatisfaction": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": ""
        },
        "description": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],

        },
        "autoReplyRequestMails": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

delete /accounts/{id}

Remove a account from PlanMill

Secured by oauth_2.0

PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • id: required (string)

Headers

  • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

    See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

    nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

    timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

    signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

    Example:

    user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
  • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

    Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

    Example:

    EUR

HTTP status code 204

No HTTP body returned

HTTP status code 400

Headers

  • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

HTTP status code 401

Headers

  • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

HTTP status code 403

Headers

  • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

HTTP status code 404

Headers

  • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

HTTP status code 429

Headers

  • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

Body

Type: application/json

HTTP status code 500

Headers

  • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

/accounts/{id}/meta get

Get meta information for the updatable fields of the account

get

View details of single meta

get /accounts/{id}/meta

View details of single meta

Secured by oauth_2.0

PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • id: required (string)

Headers

  • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

    See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

    nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

    timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

    signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

    Example:

    user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
  • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

    Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

    Example:

    EUR

HTTP status code 200

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

HTTP status code 400

Headers

  • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

HTTP status code 401

Headers

  • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

HTTP status code 403

Headers

  • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

HTTP status code 404

Headers

  • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

HTTP status code 429

Headers

  • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

Body

Type: application/json

HTTP status code 500

Headers

  • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

/accounts/{id}/attachments get

Collection of available attachments in PlanMill. This is a read-only collection

get

Get a list of attachments

get /accounts/{id}/attachments

Get a list of attachments

Secured by oauth_2.0

PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • id: required (string)

Headers

  • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

    See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

    nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

    timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

    signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

    Example:

    user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
  • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

    Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

    Example:

    EUR

Query Parameters

    HTTP status code 200

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    [
  {
    "size": 56,
    "createdBy": 2848153,
    "created": "2015-09-02T16:45:25.877+0300",
    "name": "attached_file.txt",
    "modified": "2015-09-02T16:45:23.353+0300",
    "id": 2848174
  },
  {
    "size": 56,
    "createdBy": 2848153,
    "created": "2015-09-02T16:45:25.877+0300",
    "name": "attached_file_delete.txt",
    "modified": "2015-09-02T16:45:23.353+0300",
    "id": 2848175
  }
]

    HTTP status code 400

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

    HTTP status code 401

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

    HTTP status code 403

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

    HTTP status code 404

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

    HTTP status code 429

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    HTTP status code 500

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

    /accounts/{id}/attachments/{id} put get delete

    put
    get

    View details of single attachment

    delete

    Remove a attachment from PlanMill

    put /accounts/{id}/attachments/{id}

    Secured by oauth_2.0

    PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

    • Request
    • Response

    URI Parameters

    • id: required (string)
    • id: required (string)

    Headers

    • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

      See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

      nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

      timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

      signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

      Example:

      user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
    • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

      Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

      Example:

      EUR
    • Content-Type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

      Example:

      application/json;charset=UTF-8

    HTTP status code 204

    No HTTP body returned

    HTTP status code 400

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

    HTTP status code 401

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

    HTTP status code 403

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

    Headers

    Body

    Example:

    {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

    Body

    Type: application/json

    HTTP status code 500

  "code": "00500"

    get /accounts/{id}/attachments/{id}

    View details of single attachment

    Secured by oauth_2.0

    PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

    • Request
    • Response

    URI Parameters

    • id: required (string)
    • id: required (string)

    Headers

    • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

      See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

      nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

      timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

      signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

      Example:

      user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
    • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

      Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

      Example:

      EUR

    delete /accounts/{id}/attachments/{id}

    Remove a attachment from PlanMill

    Secured by oauth_2.0

    PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

    • Request
    • Response

    URI Parameters

    • id: required (string)
    • id: required (string)

    Headers

    • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

      See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

      nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

      timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

      signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

      Example:

      user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
    • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

      Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

      Example:

      EUR

    No HTTP body returned

    /actions

    Collection of available actions in PlanMill. See actions/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

    /actions get post

    get

    Get a list of actions. See actions/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

    post

    Add a new action to PlanMill or update existing (if id is given). See actions/meta for list of columns and formats

    get /actions

    Get a list of actions. See actions/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

    Secured by oauth_2.0

    PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

    • Request
    • Response

    Headers

    • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

      See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

      nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

      timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

      signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

      Example:

      user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
    • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

      Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

      Example:

      EUR

    Query Parameters

    • rowcount: (integer - minimum: 1)

      It limits the result set amount to the specified limit to avoid API call to return too many records. Default row count is 100

    • nextrows: (integer)

      The number of the next starting row. It is dependent on rowcount. For example, for total 250 items, if rowcount is 100 and nextrows is 101, it return items 101-201

    • order: (integer)

      Orders the results in ascending or descending order. 0=Ascending and 1=Descending. It is used in combination with sort

    • sort: (string)

      Sorts the results using string that is a JSON attribute

    • interval: (string)

      Interval type, e.g. start, finish, created, or modified. It is used in combination with intervalstart or intervalfinish

    • intervalstart: (string)

      Start date of the interval in UTC format

      Example:

      2014-01-01T00:00:00.000+0200
    • intervalfinish: (string)

      Finish date of the interval in UTC format

      Example:

      2014-01-01T00:00:00.000+0200

    HTTP status code 200

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Schema:

    {
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "description": "base schema for all action entities",
  "oneOf": [{
    "type": "array",
    "items": {
      "$ref": "#/definitions/actionArray"
    }
  }, {
    "$ref": "#/definitions/actionSingle" 
  }],
  "definitions": {
    "actionSingle": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": ["subject"],
      "properties": {
        "request": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Action's request"
        },
        "private": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's view status: 0=No, 1=Yes"
        },
        "performers": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "List of action's performers"
        },
        "reminder": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's reminder: 0=No, 1=Same day as due date, 2=1 day before due date, 3= 3 days before due date, 4= 7 days before due date, 5= 14 days before due date, 6= 30 days before due date"
        },
        "subject": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Action's subject"
        },
        "dueDate": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "pattern": "(\\d{4})-([0][1-9]|[1][0-2])-([0][1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|[3][0-1])T([0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]).(\\d{3})((\\+|\\-)([0-9]|[0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3])([0-5][0-9]))",
          "description": "Action's due date"
        },
        "start": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "pattern": "(\\d{4})-([0][1-9]|[1][0-2])-([0][1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|[3][0-1])T([0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]).(\\d{3})((\\+|\\-)([0-9]|[0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3])([0-5][0-9]))",
          "description": "Action's start date"
        },
        "description": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Action description"
        },
        "project": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Action's project"
        },
        "opportunity": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Action's opportunity"
        },
        "type": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's type: 0= None, 1= Call, 2=Correspondence, 3= Demo, 4= Email, 5= Event, 6= Fax, 7= Meeting, 9= Presentation, 10= Todo, 11= Webinar"
        },
        "priority": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action priority: 1= High, 2= Medium, 3= Low "
        },
        "salesOrder": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Action's sales order"
        },
        "responsible": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Person responsible for the action"
        },
        "contact": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's contact"
        },
        "campaign": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Action's campaign"
        },
        "location": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Action's location"
        },
        "id": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "action id"
        },
        "status": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's status: 0= Received, 1= In progress, 2= In progress -waiting for more info, 4= Suspended, 40= Completed"
        }
      }
    },
    "actionArray": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": ["subject"],
      "properties": {
        "request": {
          "type": ["string", "integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's request"
        },
        "private": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's view status: 0=No, 1=Yes"
        },
        "performers": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "List of action's performers"
        },
        "reminder": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's reminder: 0=No, 1=Same day as due date, 2=1 day before due date, 3= 3 days before due date, 4= 7 days before due date, 5= 14 days before due date, 6= 30 days before due date"
        },
        "subject": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Action's subject"
        },
        "dueDate": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "pattern": "(\\d{4})-([0][1-9]|[1][0-2])-([0][1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|[3][0-1])T([0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]).(\\d{3})((\\+|\\-)([0-9]|[0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3])([0-5][0-9]))",
          "description": "Action's due date"
        },
        "start": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "pattern": "(\\d{4})-([0][1-9]|[1][0-2])-([0][1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|[3][0-1])T([0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]).(\\d{3})((\\+|\\-)([0-9]|[0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3])([0-5][0-9]))",
          "description": "Action's start date"
        },
        "project": {
          "type": ["string", "integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's project"
        },
        "opportunity": {
          "type": ["string", "integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's opportunity"
        },
        "type": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's type: 0= None, 1= Call, 2=Correspondence, 3= Demo, 4= Email, 5= Event, 6= Fax, 7= Meeting, 9= Presentation, 10= Todo, 11= Webinar"
        },
        "priority": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action priority: 1= High, 2= Medium, 3= Low "
        },
        "salesOrder": {
          "type": ["string", "integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's sales order"
        },
        "responsible": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Person responsible for the action"
        },
        "contact": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's contact"
        },
        "campaign": {
          "type": ["string", "integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's campaign"
        },
        "location": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Action's location"
        },
        "id": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "action id"
        },
        "status": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's status: 0= Received, 1= In progress, 2= In progress -waiting for more info, 4= Suspended, 40= Completed"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

    Example:

    [
  {
    "request": 6827,
    "private": 0,
    "reminder": 0,
    "subject": "Test Action 1",
    "created": "2015-01-19T09:44:00.000+0200",
    "dueDate": "2015-10-19T00:00:00.000+0300",
    "start": "2015-10-19T00:00:00.000+0300",
    "opportunity": 5684,
    "project": 8572,
    "type": 1,
    "priority": 2,
    "salesOrder": 6891,
    "contact": 9658,
    "responsible": 4935,
    "modified": "2015-01-19T09:44:00.000+0200",
    "campaign": 7862,
    "location": "Tampere",
    "id": 599448,
    "status": 0
  },
  {
    "request": null,
    "private": 0,
    "reminder": 0,
    "subject": "Test Action 2",
    "created": "2015-09-07T16:27:06.920+0300",
    "dueDate": "2015-09-30T00:00:00.000+0300",
    "start": "2015-09-08T00:00:00.000+0300",
    "opportunity": 2579,
    "project": 5713,
    "type": 10,
    "priority": 2,
    "salesOrder": 5272,
    "contact": 5571,
    "responsible": 5547,
    "modified": "2015-09-08T12:16:27.593+0300",
    "campaign": 6954,
    "location": "Helsinki",
    "id": 5739,
    "status": 0
  },
  {
    "request": null,
    "private": 0,
    "reminder": 0,
    "subject": "Test Action 3",
    "created": "2010-01-13T10:16:00.000+0200",
    "dueDate": "2010-10-13T00:00:00.000+0300",
    "start": "2010-10-13T00:00:00.000+0300",
    "opportunity": null,
    "project": null,
    "type": 1,
    "priority": 2,
    "salesOrder": null,
    "contact": null,
    "responsible": 439,
    "modified": "2010-01-13T10:16:00.000+0200",
    "campaign": null,
    "location": null,
    "id": 600126,
    "status": 1
  }
]

    HTTP status code 400

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

    HTTP status code 401

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

    HTTP status code 403

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

    HTTP status code 404

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

    HTTP status code 429

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    HTTP status code 500

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

    post /actions

    Add a new action to PlanMill or update existing (if id is given). See actions/meta for list of columns and formats

    Secured by oauth_2.0

    PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

    • Request
    • Response

    Headers

    • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

      See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

      nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

      timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

      signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

      Example:

      user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
    • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

      Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

      Example:

      EUR
    • Content-Type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

      Example:

      application/json;charset=UTF-8

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Schema:

    {
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "description": "base schema for all action entities",
  "oneOf": [{
    "type": "array",
    "items": {
      "$ref": "#/definitions/actionArray"
    }
  }, {
    "$ref": "#/definitions/actionSingle" 
  }],
  "definitions": {
    "actionSingle": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": ["subject"],
      "properties": {
        "request": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Action's request"
        },
        "private": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's view status: 0=No, 1=Yes"
        },
        "performers": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "List of action's performers"
        },
        "reminder": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's reminder: 0=No, 1=Same day as due date, 2=1 day before due date, 3= 3 days before due date, 4= 7 days before due date, 5= 14 days before due date, 6= 30 days before due date"
        },
        "subject": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Action's subject"
        },
        "dueDate": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "pattern": "(\\d{4})-([0][1-9]|[1][0-2])-([0][1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|[3][0-1])T([0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]).(\\d{3})((\\+|\\-)([0-9]|[0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3])([0-5][0-9]))",
          "description": "Action's due date"
        },
        "start": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "pattern": "(\\d{4})-([0][1-9]|[1][0-2])-([0][1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|[3][0-1])T([0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]).(\\d{3})((\\+|\\-)([0-9]|[0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3])([0-5][0-9]))",
          "description": "Action's start date"
        },
        "description": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Action description"
        },
        "project": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Action's project"
        },
        "opportunity": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Action's opportunity"
        },
        "type": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's type: 0= None, 1= Call, 2=Correspondence, 3= Demo, 4= Email, 5= Event, 6= Fax, 7= Meeting, 9= Presentation, 10= Todo, 11= Webinar"
        },
        "priority": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action priority: 1= High, 2= Medium, 3= Low "
        },
        "salesOrder": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Action's sales order"
        },
        "responsible": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Person responsible for the action"
        },
        "contact": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's contact"
        },
        "campaign": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Action's campaign"
        },
        "location": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Action's location"
        },
        "id": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "action id"
        },
        "status": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's status: 0= Received, 1= In progress, 2= In progress -waiting for more info, 4= Suspended, 40= Completed"
        }
      }
    },
    "actionArray": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": ["subject"],
      "properties": {
        "request": {
          "type": ["string", "integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's request"
        },
        "private": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's view status: 0=No, 1=Yes"
        },
        "performers": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "List of action's performers"
        },
        "reminder": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's reminder: 0=No, 1=Same day as due date, 2=1 day before due date, 3= 3 days before due date, 4= 7 days before due date, 5= 14 days before due date, 6= 30 days before due date"
        },
        "subject": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Action's subject"
        },
        "dueDate": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "pattern": "(\\d{4})-([0][1-9]|[1][0-2])-([0][1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|[3][0-1])T([0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]).(\\d{3})((\\+|\\-)([0-9]|[0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3])([0-5][0-9]))",
          "description": "Action's due date"
        },
        "start": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "pattern": "(\\d{4})-([0][1-9]|[1][0-2])-([0][1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|[3][0-1])T([0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]).(\\d{3})((\\+|\\-)([0-9]|[0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3])([0-5][0-9]))",
          "description": "Action's start date"
        },
        "project": {
          "type": ["string", "integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's project"
        },
        "opportunity": {
          "type": ["string", "integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's opportunity"
        },
        "type": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's type: 0= None, 1= Call, 2=Correspondence, 3= Demo, 4= Email, 5= Event, 6= Fax, 7= Meeting, 9= Presentation, 10= Todo, 11= Webinar"
        },
        "priority": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action priority: 1= High, 2= Medium, 3= Low "
        },
        "salesOrder": {
          "type": ["string", "integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's sales order"
        },
        "responsible": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Person responsible for the action"
        },
        "contact": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's contact"
        },
        "campaign": {
          "type": ["string", "integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's campaign"
        },
        "location": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Action's location"
        },
        "id": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "action id"
        },
        "status": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's status: 0= Received, 1= In progress, 2= In progress -waiting for more info, 4= Suspended, 40= Completed"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

    Example:

    {
  "request": 6875,
  "private": 0,
  "performers": "5547,50",
  "reminder": 1,
  "subject": "Test Action",
  "dueDate": "2015-06-26T10:08:00.000+0300",
  "start": "2015-06-26T10:08:00.000+0300",
  "description": "<p>test description</p>",
  "project": 9851,
  "opportunity": 3257,
  "type": 5,
  "priority": 2,
  "salesOrder": 6981,
  "responsible": 28482,
  "contact": 9647,
  "campaign": 5214,
  "location": Oulu,
  "id": 2842904,
  "status": 1
}

    HTTP status code 201

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    { "id" : 123456 }

    HTTP status code 400

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

    HTTP status code 401

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

    HTTP status code 403

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

    HTTP status code 404

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

    HTTP status code 429

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    HTTP status code 500

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

    /actions/meta get

    Get meta information for actions. Includes resource's fields names and type and related filters

    get

    View details of single meta

    get /actions/meta

    View details of single meta

    Secured by oauth_2.0

    PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

    • Request
    • Response

    Headers

    • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

      See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

      nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

      timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

      signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

      Example:

      user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
    • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

      Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

      Example:

      EUR

    HTTP status code 200

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "filters": [
    {
      "name": "searchkey",
      "caption": ""
    },
    {
      "name": "viewby",
      "caption": "View by",
      "values": {
        "All recently modified actions - last 7 days": "17",
        "All open actions - customers": "9",
        "All open actions - prospects": "10",
        "My all actions": "6",
        "My open actions": "0",

        "All actions": "7",
        "All completed actions - prospects": "14",

        "All recently created actions - last 7 days": "15",

        "Created": "created"

        "25": "25",

        "All": "-1",
        "Admin, Test": 2833
      }

  ],
  "fields": {
    "request": {
      "format": "text",
      "caption": "Action.RequestId"
    },
    "private": {
      "format": "Enumeration values.Sales management.Actions.View status",
      "caption": "Private"
    },
    "reminder": {
      "format": "Enumeration values.Sales management.Actions.Reminder",
      "caption": "Reminder"
    },
    "subject": {
      "format": "text",
      "caption": "_Subject"
    },
    "created": {
      "format": "mediumdate",
      "caption": "Created"
    },
    "dueDate": {
      "format": "mediumdate",
      "caption": "Due date"
    },
    "start": {
      "format": "mediumdate",
      "caption": "Start"
    },
    "opportunity": {
      "format": "text",
      "caption": "Action.OpportunityId"
    },
    "project": {
      "format": "text",
      "caption": "Action.ProjectId"
    },
    "type": {
      "format": "Enumeration values.Sales management.Actions.Type",
      "caption": "Type"
    },
    "priority": {
      "format": "Enumeration values.Sales management.Actions.Priority",
      "caption": "Priority"
    },
    "salesOrder": {
      "format": "text",
      "caption": "Action.SalesOrderId"
    },
    "contact": {
      "format": "text",
      "caption": "Person.Id"
    },
    "responsible": {
      "format": "text",
      "caption": "Person1.Id"
    },
    "modified": {
      "format": "mediumdate",
      "caption": "Modified"
    },
    "campaign": {
      "format": "text",
      "caption": "Action.CampaignId"
    },
    "location": {
      "format": "text",
      "caption": "Location"
    },
    "id": {
      "format": "checkbox",
      "caption": "_"
    },
    "status": {
      "format": "Enumeration values.Sales management.Actions.Status",
      "caption": "Status"
    }
  }
}

    HTTP status code 400

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

    HTTP status code 401

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

    HTTP status code 403

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

    HTTP status code 404

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

    HTTP status code 429

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    HTTP status code 500

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

    /actions/{id} get post delete

    A single action in PlanMill.

    get

    View details of single action. See actions/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

    post

    Update an existing resource action to PlanMill. See actions/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

    delete

    Remove a action from PlanMill

    get /actions/{id}

    View details of single action. See actions/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

    Secured by oauth_2.0

    PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

    • Request
    • Response

    URI Parameters

    • id: required (string)

    Headers

    • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

      See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

      nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

      timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

      signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

      Example:

      user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
    • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

      Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

      Example:

      EUR

    HTTP status code 200

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "request": 6875,
  "private": 0,
  "performers": "5547,50",
  "reminder": 1,
  "subject": "Test Action",
  "dueDate": "2015-06-26T10:08:00.000+0300",
  "start": "2015-06-26T10:08:00.000+0300",
  "description": "<p>test description</p>",
  "project": 9851,
  "opportunity": 3257,
  "type": 5,
  "priority": 2,
  "salesOrder": 6981,
  "responsible": 28482,
  "contact": 9647,
  "campaign": 5214,
  "location": Oulu,
  "id": 2842904,
  "status": 1
}

    HTTP status code 400

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

    HTTP status code 401

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

    HTTP status code 403

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

    HTTP status code 404

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    HTTP status code 500

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

    post /actions/{id}

    Update an existing resource action to PlanMill. See actions/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

    Secured by oauth_2.0

    PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

    • Request
    • Response

    URI Parameters

    • id: required (string)

    Headers

    • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

      See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

      nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

      timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

      signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

      Example:

      user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
    • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

      Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

      Example:

      EUR
    • Content-Type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

      Example:

      application/json;charset=UTF-8

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Schema:

    {
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "description": "base schema for all action entities",
  "oneOf": [{
    "type": "array",
    "items": {
      "$ref": "#/definitions/actionArray"
    }
  }, {
    "$ref": "#/definitions/actionSingle" 
  }],
  "definitions": {
    "actionSingle": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": ["subject"],
      "properties": {
        "request": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Action's request"
        },
        "private": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's view status: 0=No, 1=Yes"
        },
        "performers": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "List of action's performers"
        },
        "reminder": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's reminder: 0=No, 1=Same day as due date, 2=1 day before due date, 3= 3 days before due date, 4= 7 days before due date, 5= 14 days before due date, 6= 30 days before due date"
        },
        "subject": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Action's subject"
        },
        "dueDate": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "pattern": "(\\d{4})-([0][1-9]|[1][0-2])-([0][1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|[3][0-1])T([0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]).(\\d{3})((\\+|\\-)([0-9]|[0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3])([0-5][0-9]))",
          "description": "Action's due date"
        },
        "start": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "pattern": "(\\d{4})-([0][1-9]|[1][0-2])-([0][1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|[3][0-1])T([0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]).(\\d{3})((\\+|\\-)([0-9]|[0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3])([0-5][0-9]))",
          "description": "Action's start date"
        },
        "description": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Action description"
        },
        "project": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Action's project"
        },
        "opportunity": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Action's opportunity"
        },
        "type": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's type: 0= None, 1= Call, 2=Correspondence, 3= Demo, 4= Email, 5= Event, 6= Fax, 7= Meeting, 9= Presentation, 10= Todo, 11= Webinar"
        },
        "priority": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action priority: 1= High, 2= Medium, 3= Low "
        },
        "salesOrder": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Action's sales order"
        },
        "responsible": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Person responsible for the action"
        },
        "contact": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's contact"
        },
        "campaign": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Action's campaign"
        },
        "location": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Action's location"
        },
        "id": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "action id"
        },
        "status": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's status: 0= Received, 1= In progress, 2= In progress -waiting for more info, 4= Suspended, 40= Completed"
        }
      }
    },
    "actionArray": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": ["subject"],
      "properties": {
        "request": {
          "type": ["string", "integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's request"
        },
        "private": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's view status: 0=No, 1=Yes"
        },
        "performers": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "List of action's performers"
        },
        "reminder": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's reminder: 0=No, 1=Same day as due date, 2=1 day before due date, 3= 3 days before due date, 4= 7 days before due date, 5= 14 days before due date, 6= 30 days before due date"
        },
        "subject": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Action's subject"
        },
        "dueDate": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "pattern": "(\\d{4})-([0][1-9]|[1][0-2])-([0][1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|[3][0-1])T([0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]).(\\d{3})((\\+|\\-)([0-9]|[0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3])([0-5][0-9]))",
          "description": "Action's due date"
        },
        "start": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "pattern": "(\\d{4})-([0][1-9]|[1][0-2])-([0][1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|[3][0-1])T([0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]).(\\d{3})((\\+|\\-)([0-9]|[0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3])([0-5][0-9]))",
          "description": "Action's start date"
        },
        "project": {
          "type": ["string", "integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's project"
        },
        "opportunity": {
          "type": ["string", "integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's opportunity"
        },
        "type": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's type: 0= None, 1= Call, 2=Correspondence, 3= Demo, 4= Email, 5= Event, 6= Fax, 7= Meeting, 9= Presentation, 10= Todo, 11= Webinar"
        },
        "priority": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action priority: 1= High, 2= Medium, 3= Low "
        },
        "salesOrder": {
          "type": ["string", "integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's sales order"
        },
        "responsible": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Person responsible for the action"
        },
        "contact": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's contact"
        },
        "campaign": {
          "type": ["string", "integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's campaign"
        },
        "location": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Action's location"
        },
        "id": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "action id"
        },
        "status": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Action's status: 0= Received, 1= In progress, 2= In progress -waiting for more info, 4= Suspended, 40= Completed"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

    Example:

    {
  "request": 6875,
  "private": 0,
  "performers": "5547,50",
  "reminder": 1,
  "subject": "Test Action",
  "dueDate": "2015-06-26T10:08:00.000+0300",
  "start": "2015-06-26T10:08:00.000+0300",
  "description": "<p>test description</p>",
  "project": 9851,
  "opportunity": 3257,
  "type": 5,
  "priority": 2,
  "salesOrder": 6981,
  "responsible": 28482,
  "contact": 9647,
  "campaign": 5214,
  "location": Oulu,
  "id": 2842904,
  "status": 1
}

    HTTP status code 204

    No HTTP body returned

    HTTP status code 400

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

    HTTP status code 401

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

    HTTP status code 403

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

    HTTP status code 404

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

    HTTP status code 429

    Headers

    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

    Body

    Type: application/json

    HTTP status code 500

    Headers

    Body

    Type: application/json

    Example:

    {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
