              HTTP status code 400

              Headers

              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

              Body

              Type: application/json

              Example:

              {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

              HTTP status code 401

              Headers

              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

              Body

              Type: application/json

              Example:

              {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

              HTTP status code 403

              Headers

              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

              Body

              Type: application/json

              Example:

              {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

              HTTP status code 404

              Headers

              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

              Body

              Type: application/json

              Example:

              {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

              HTTP status code 429

              Headers

              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

              Body

              Type: application/json

              HTTP status code 500

              Headers

              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

              Body

              Type: application/json

              Example:

              {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

              post /contacts

              Add a new contact to PlanMill or update existing (if id is given). See contacts/meta for list of columns and formats

              Secured by oauth_2.0

              PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

              • Request
              • Response

              Headers

              • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                Example:

                user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
              • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                Example:

                EUR
              • Content-Type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                Example:

                application/json;charset=UTF-8

              Body

              Type: application/json

              Schema:

              {
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "description": "base schema for all contacts entities",
  "oneOf": [
    {
      "type": "array",
      "items": { "$ref": "#/definitions/contactArray" }
    },
    {
      "$ref": "#/definitions/contactSingle"
    }
  ],
  "definitions": {
    "contactSingle": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": [ "lastName", "account", "passive" ],
      "properties": {
        "firstName": {
          "type": "string",
          "maxLength": 80,
          "description": "First name of a contact"
        },
        "lastName": {
          "type": "string",
          "maxLength": 80,
          "description": "Last name of a contact "
        },
        "passive": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Contact status can be active or passive. 0=Active 1=InActive"
        },
        "account": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Id of contact's account"
        },
        "languageCode": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Language code"
        },
        "role": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Basic Roles: 1=Administrator, 2=Power, 3=Pro, 4=Team, 5=Sales"
        },
        "title": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Title of contact"
        },
        "email": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Email address of contact"
        },
        "secondaryAddress": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Secondary address of contact"
        },
        "primaryState": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Primary state of contact"
        },
        "secondaryEmail": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Secondary email of contact"
        },
        "primaryPostalCode": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Primary postal code of contact"
        },
        "accountName": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Account name of contact"
        },
        "secondaryDepartment": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Secondary Department name of contact"
        },
        "blog": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Contact's blog"
        },
        "primaryCity": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Contact's city"
        },
        "secondaryPostalCode": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Contact's secondary postal code"
        },
        "skype": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Contact's skype name"
        },
        "twitter": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Contact's twitter account name"
        },
        "primaryDepartment": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Contact's primary department"
        },
        "secondaryCity": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Contact's secondary city"
        },
        "id": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Contact's id"
        },
        "department": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Contact's department"
        },
        "fax": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Contact's fax"
        },
        "primaryCountry": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Contact's primary country"
        },
        "secondaryCountry": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Contact's secondary country"
        },
        "facebook": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Contact's facebook address"
        },
        "linkedIn": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Contact's linkedIn address"
        },
        "projectWikiUserGroup": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Contact's projectWikiUserGroup"
        },
        "mobilePhone": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Contact's mobile phone number"
        },
        "workPhone": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Contact's work phone number"
        },
        "googleTalk": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Contact's google talk address"
        },
        "primaryAddress": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Contact's primary address"
        }
      }
    },
    "contactArray": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": [
        "lastName",
        "account",
        "passive"
      ],
      "properties": {
        "firstName": {
          "type": "string",
          "maxLength": 80,
          "description": "First name of a contact"
        },
        "lastName": {
          "type": "string",
          "maxLength": 80,
          "description": "Last name of a contact "
        },
        "passive": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Contact status can be active or passive. 0=Active 1=InActive"
        },
        "account": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Id of contact's account"
        },
        "languageCode": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Language code"
        },
        "role": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Basic Roles: 1=Administrator, 2=Power, 3=Pro, 4=Team, 5=Sales"
        },
        "title": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Title of contact"
        },
        "email": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Email address of contact"
        },
        "secondaryAddress": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Secondary address of contact"
        },
        "primaryState": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Primary state of contact"
        },
        "secondaryEmail": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Secondary email of contact"
        },
        "primaryPostalCode": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Primary postal code of contact"
        },
        "accountName": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Account name of contact"
        },
        "secondaryDepartment": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Secondary Department name of contact"
        },
        "blog": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Contact's blog"
        },
        "primaryCity": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Contact's city"
        },
        "secondaryPostalCode": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Contact's secondary postal code"
        },
        "skype": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Contact's skype name"
        },
        "twitter": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],

        },

          "type": ["string", "null"],

              Example:

              {

              HTTP status code 201

              Body

              Type: application/json

              Example:

              { "id" : 123456 }

              HTTP status code 500

  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"

              /contacts/meta get

              Get meta information for contacts. Includes resource's fields names and type and related filters

              get

              View details of single meta

              get /contacts/meta

              View details of single meta

              Secured by oauth_2.0

              PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

              • Request
              • Response

              Headers

              • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                Example:

                user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
              • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                Example:

                EUR

              HTTP status code 200

              Body

              Type: application/json

              Example:

              {
  "filters": [
    {
      "name": "searchkey",
      "caption": ""
    },
    {
      "name": "viewby",
      "caption": "View by",
      "values": {
        "My active contacts": "0",

              HTTP status code 400

              Headers

              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

              Body

              Type: application/json

              Example:

              {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

              HTTP status code 401

              Headers

              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

              Body

              Type: application/json

              Example:

              {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

              HTTP status code 403

              Headers

              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

              Body

              Type: application/json

              Example:

              {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

              HTTP status code 404

              Headers

              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

              Body

              Type: application/json

              Example:

              {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

              HTTP status code 429

              Headers

              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

              Body

              Type: application/json

              HTTP status code 500

              Headers

              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

              Body

              Type: application/json

              Example:

              {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

              /contacts/{id} get post delete

              A single contact in PlanMill.

              get

              View details of single contact. See contacts/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

              post

              Update an existing resource contact to PlanMill. See contacts/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

              delete

              Remove a contact from PlanMill

              get /contacts/{id}

              View details of single contact. See contacts/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

              Secured by oauth_2.0

              PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

              • Request
              • Response

              URI Parameters

              • id: required (string)

              Headers

              • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                Example:

                user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
              • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                Example:

                EUR

              HTTP status code 200

              Body

              Type: application/json

              Example:

              {
  "lastName": "Tester",
  "secondaryAddress": "Kuitinkatu 2",
  "primaryState": null,
  "secondaryEmail": "",
  "role": 1,
  "primaryPostalCode": "00500",
  "accountName": "PlanMill Oy",
  "secondaryDepartment": "HR Department",
  "title": "Software Engineer",
  "blog": "http://www.blog.com",
  "primaryCity": "Helsinki",
  "secondaryPostalCode": "03641",
  "skype": "skpe_id",
  "twitter": "http://www.twitter.com",
  "primaryDepartment": null,
  "secondaryCity": "Espoo",
  "id": 3081,
  "department": "Software Development",
  "fax": "+358-466-5556951",
  "primaryCountry": 73,
  "email": "mikko.tester@planmill.com",
  "secondaryCountry": 73,
  "facebook": "http://www.facebook.com",
  "secondaryState": "",
  "linkedIn": "http://www.linkedin.com",
  "projectWikiUserGroup": null,
  "languageCode": "en",
  "passive": 0,
  "firstName": "Mikko",
  "mobilePhone": "+358-466-5556951",
  "workPhone": "+358 10 322 9110",
  "googleTalk": "gtalk_id",
  "primaryAddress": "Hämeentie 19",
  "account": 51
}

              HTTP status code 400

              Headers

              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

              Body

              Type: application/json

              Example:

              {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

              HTTP status code 401

              Headers

              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

              Body

              Type: application/json

              Example:

              {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

              HTTP status code 403

              Headers

              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

              Body

              Type: application/json

              Example:

              {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

              HTTP status code 404

              Headers

              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

              Body

              Type: application/json

              Example:

              {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

              HTTP status code 429

              Headers

              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

              Body

              Type: application/json

              HTTP status code 500

              Headers

              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

              Body

              Type: application/json

              Example:

              {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

              post /contacts/{id}

              Update an existing resource contact to PlanMill. See contacts/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

              Secured by oauth_2.0

              PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

              • Request
              • Response

              URI Parameters

              • id: required (string)

              Headers

              • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                Example:

                user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
              • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                Example:

                EUR
              • Content-Type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                Example:

                application/json;charset=UTF-8

              Body

              Type: application/json

              Schema:

              {
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "description": "base schema for all contacts entities",
  "oneOf": [
    {
      "type": "array",
      "items": { "$ref": "#/definitions/contactArray" }
    },
    {
      "$ref": "#/definitions/contactSingle"
    }
  ],
  "definitions": {
    "contactSingle": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": [ "lastName", "account", "passive" ],
      "properties": {
        "firstName": {
          "type": "string",
          "maxLength": 80,
          "description": "First name of a contact"
        },
        "lastName": {
          "type": "string",
          "maxLength": 80,
          "description": "Last name of a contact "
        },
        "passive": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Contact status can be active or passive. 0=Active 1=InActive"
        },
        "account": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Id of contact's account"
        },
        "languageCode": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Language code"
        },
        "role": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Basic Roles: 1=Administrator, 2=Power, 3=Pro, 4=Team, 5=Sales"
        },
        "title": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Title of contact"
        },
        "email": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Email address of contact"
        },
        "secondaryAddress": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Secondary address of contact"
        },
        "primaryState": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Primary state of contact"
        },
        "secondaryEmail": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Secondary email of contact"
        },
        "primaryPostalCode": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Primary postal code of contact"
        },
        "accountName": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Account name of contact"
        },
        "secondaryDepartment": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Secondary Department name of contact"
        },
        "blog": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Contact's blog"
        },
        "primaryCity": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Contact's city"
        },
        "secondaryPostalCode": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Contact's secondary postal code"
        },
        "skype": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Contact's skype name"
        },
        "twitter": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Contact's twitter account name"
        },
        "primaryDepartment": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Contact's primary department"
        },
        "secondaryCity": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Contact's secondary city"
        },
        "id": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Contact's id"
        },
        "department": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Contact's department"
        },
        "fax": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Contact's fax"
        },
        "primaryCountry": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Contact's primary country"
        },
        "secondaryCountry": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Contact's secondary country"
        },
        "facebook": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],

        },
        "projectWikiUserGroup": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],

        }
      }
    },
    "contactArray": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": [
        "lastName",
        "account",
        "passive"
      ],
      "properties": {
        "firstName": {
          "type": "string",
          "maxLength": 80,
          "description": "First name of a contact"

              Example:

              {
  "lastName": "Tester",
  "secondaryAddress": "Kuitinkatu 2",
  "primaryState": null,
  "secondaryEmail": "",
  "role": 1,
  "primaryPostalCode": "00500",
  "accountName": "PlanMill Oy",
  "secondaryDepartment": "HR Department",
  "title": "Software Engineer",
  "blog": "http://www.blog.com",
  "primaryCity": "Helsinki",
  "secondaryPostalCode": "03641",
  "skype": "skpe_id",
  "twitter": "http://www.twitter.com",
  "primaryDepartment": null,
  "secondaryCity": "Espoo",
  "id": 3081,
  "department": "Software Development",
  "fax": "+358-466-5556951",
  "primaryCountry": 73,
  "email": "mikko.tester@planmill.com",
  "secondaryCountry": 73,
  "facebook": "http://www.facebook.com",
  "secondaryState": "",
  "linkedIn": "http://www.linkedin.com",
  "projectWikiUserGroup": null,
  "languageCode": "en",
  "passive": 0,
  "firstName": "Mikko",
  "mobilePhone": "+358-466-5556951",
  "workPhone": "+358 10 322 9110",
  "googleTalk": "gtalk_id",
  "primaryAddress": "Hämeentie 19",
  "account": 51
}

              HTTP status code 204

              No HTTP body returned

              HTTP status code 400

              Headers

              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

              Body

              Type: application/json

              Example:

              {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

              HTTP status code 401

              Headers

              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

              Body

              Type: application/json

              Example:

              {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

              HTTP status code 403

              Headers

              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

              Body

              Type: application/json

              Example:

              {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

              HTTP status code 404

              Headers

              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

              Body

              Type: application/json

              Example:

              {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

              HTTP status code 429

              Headers

              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

              Body

              Type: application/json

              HTTP status code 500

              Headers

              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

              Body

              Type: application/json

              Example:

              {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

              delete /contacts/{id}

              Remove a contact from PlanMill

              Secured by oauth_2.0

              PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

              • Request
              • Response

              URI Parameters

              • id: required (string)

              Headers

              • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                Example:

                user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
              • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                Example:

                EUR

              HTTP status code 204

              No HTTP body returned

              HTTP status code 400

              Headers

              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

              Body

              Type: application/json

              Example:

              {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

              HTTP status code 401

              Headers

              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

              Body

              Type: application/json

              Example:

              {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

              HTTP status code 403

              Headers

              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

              Body

              Type: application/json

              Example:

              {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

              HTTP status code 404

              Headers

              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

              Body

              Type: application/json

              Example:

              {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

              HTTP status code 429

              Headers

              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

              Body

              Type: application/json

              HTTP status code 500

              Headers

              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

              Body

              Type: application/json

              Example:

              {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"

              /contacts/{id}/meta get

              Get meta information for the updatable fields of the contact

              get

              View details of single meta

              get /contacts/{id}/meta

              View details of single meta

              Secured by oauth_2.0

              PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

              • Request
              • Response

              URI Parameters

              • id: required (string)

              Headers

              • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                Example:

                user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
              • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                Example:

                EUR

              HTTP status code 200

              Body

              Type: application/json

              Example:

              /contacts/{id}/attachments get

              Collection of available attachments in PlanMill. This is a read-only collection

              get

              Get a list of attachments

              get /contacts/{id}/attachments

              Get a list of attachments

              Secured by oauth_2.0

              PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

              • Request
              • Response

              URI Parameters

              • id: required (string)

              Headers

              • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                Example:

                user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
              • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                Example:

                EUR

              Query Parameters

                HTTP status code 200

                Body

                Type: application/json

                Example:

                [
  {
    "size": 56,
    "createdBy": 2848153,
    "created": "2015-09-02T16:45:25.877+0300",
    "name": "attached_file.txt",
    "modified": "2015-09-02T16:45:23.353+0300",
    "id": 2848174
  },
  {
    "size": 56,
    "createdBy": 2848153,
    "created": "2015-09-02T16:45:25.877+0300",
    "name": "attached_file_delete.txt",
    "modified": "2015-09-02T16:45:23.353+0300",
    "id": 2848175
  }
]

                HTTP status code 400

                Headers

                • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                Body

                Type: application/json

                Example:

                {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

                HTTP status code 401

                Headers

                • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                Body

                Type: application/json

                Example:

                {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

                HTTP status code 403

                Headers

                • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                Body

                Type: application/json

                Example:

                {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

                HTTP status code 404

                Headers

                • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                Body

                Type: application/json

                Example:

                {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

                HTTP status code 429

                Headers

                • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                Body

                Type: application/json

                HTTP status code 500

                Headers

                • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                Body

                Type: application/json

                Example:

                {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

                /contacts/{id}/attachments/{id} put get delete

                put
                get

                View details of single attachment

                delete

                Remove a attachment from PlanMill

                put /contacts/{id}/attachments/{id}

                Secured by oauth_2.0

                PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

                • Request
                • Response

                URI Parameters

                • id: required (string)
                • id: required (string)

                Headers

                • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                  See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                  nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                  timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                  signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                  Example:

                  user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
                • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                  Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                  Example:

                  EUR
                • Content-Type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                  Example:

                  application/json;charset=UTF-8

                HTTP status code 204

                No HTTP body returned

                HTTP status code 400

                Headers

                • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                Body

                Type: application/json

                Example:

                {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

                HTTP status code 401

                Headers

                • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                Body

                Type: application/json

                Example:

                {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

                HTTP status code 403

                Headers

                • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                Body

                Type: application/json

                Example:

                {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

                HTTP status code 404

                Headers

                • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                Body

                Type: application/json

                Example:

                {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

                HTTP status code 429

                Headers

                • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                Body

                Type: application/json

                HTTP status code 500

                Headers

                • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                Body

                Type: application/json

                Example:

                {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

                get /contacts/{id}/attachments/{id}

                View details of single attachment

                Secured by oauth_2.0

                PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

                • Request
                • Response

                URI Parameters

                • id: required (string)
                • id: required (string)

                Headers

                • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                  See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                  nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                  timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                  signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                  Example:

                  user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
                • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                  Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                  Example:

                  EUR

                HTTP status code 200

                Body

                Type: application/json

                Example:

                Contents of file

                HTTP status code 400

                Headers

                • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                Body

                Type: application/json

                Example:

                {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

                HTTP status code 401

                Headers

                • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                Body

                Type: application/json

                Example:

                {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

                HTTP status code 403

                Headers

                • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                Body

                Type: application/json

                Example:

                {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

                HTTP status code 404

                Headers

                • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                Body

                Type: application/json

                Example:

                {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

                HTTP status code 429

                Headers

                • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                Body

                Type: application/json

                HTTP status code 500

                Headers

                • id: required (string)

                  See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                  nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                  timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                  signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                  Example:

                  user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=

                  Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                /enumerations

                Enumerations available in PlanMill

                /enumerations get

                get

                View details of single enumeration

                get /enumerations

                View details of single enumeration

                Secured by oauth_2.0

                PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

                • Request
                • Response

                Headers

                • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                  See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                  nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                  timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                  signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                  Example:

                  user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
                • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                  Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                  Example:

                  EUR

                Query Parameters

                • name: (string)

                  Name of enumeration

                  Example:

                  Employee directory.Appraisals.Status
                • section: (string)

                  Category of enumeration

                  Example:

                  Employee directory.Appraisals

                HTTP status code 200

                Body

                Type: application/json

                Example:

                {
  "Enumeration values.Employee directory.Appraisals.Status": {
    "10": "Preliminary",
    "20": "Employee writes comments",
    "30": "Ready for meeting",
    "40": "Final version for comments",
    "50": "Final version, requires additional discussion",
    "60": "Final version, accepted"
  }
}

                HTTP status code 400

                Headers

                • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                Body

                Type: application/json

                Example:

                {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"

                /exitcriteria

                Kanban board exit criteria from PlanMill

                /exitcriteria get

                get

                Get a list of exitcriteria

                get /exitcriteria

                Get a list of exitcriteria

                Secured by oauth_2.0

                PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

                • Request
                • Response

                Headers

                • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                  See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                  nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                  timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                  signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                  Example:

                  user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
                • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                  Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                  Example:

                  EUR

                Query Parameters

                  HTTP status code 200

                  Body

                  Type: application/json

                  Schema:

                  {
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "description": "base schema for all exit criteria entities",
  "oneOf": [
    {
      "type": "array",
      "items": { "$ref": "#/definitions/exitCriteriaArray" }
    },
    {
      "$ref": "#/definitions/exitCriteriaSingle"
    }
  ],
  "definitions": {
    "exitCriteriaSingle": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": ["boardlist", "name"],
      "additionalProperties": false,
      "properties": {
        "name": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Name of a board list"
        },
        "updatedFields": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": ""
        },
        "id": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Id of a board list"
        },
        "resource": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Type of a resource"
        },
        "filters": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Filters of a resource"
        },
        "ordinalNumber": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": ""
        },
        "board": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "The board that the boardlist belongs to"
        }
      }
    },
    "exitCriteriaArray": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": [
        "sender"
      ],
      "additionalProperties": false,
      "properties": {
        "name": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Name of a board list"
        },
        "updatedFields": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": ""
        },
        "id": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Id of a board list"
        },
        "resource": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Type of a resource"
        },
        "filters": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Filters of a resource"
        },
        "ordinalNumber": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": ""
        },
        "board": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "The board that the boardlist belongs to"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

                  Example:

                  {
  "name": "Test exit criteria",
  "boardlist": 4775,
  "description": null,
  "id": 4785
}

                  HTTP status code 400

                  Headers

                  • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                  Body

                  Type: application/json

                  Example:

                  {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

                  HTTP status code 401

                  Headers

                  • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                  Body

                  Type: application/json

                  Example:

                  {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

                  HTTP status code 403

                  Headers

                  • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                  Body

                  Type: application/json

                  Example:

                  {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

                  HTTP status code 404

                  Headers

                  • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                  Body

                  Type: application/json

                  Example:

                  {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

                  HTTP status code 429

                  Headers

                  • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                  Body

                  Type: application/json

                  HTTP status code 500

                  Headers

                  • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                  Body

                  Type: application/json

                  Example:

                  {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"

                  A single exitcriterion in PlanMill.

                  View details of single exitcriterion. See exitcriteria/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

                  Update an existing resource exitcriterion to PlanMill. See exitcriteria/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

                  delete

                  Remove a exitcriterion from PlanMill

                  get /exitcriteria/{id}

                  View details of single exitcriterion. See exitcriteria/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

                    user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=

                    Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used.                   exitcriterion

                    See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                    nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                    Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used.                   {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

                  HTTP status code 429

                  Headers

                  • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                  Body

                  Type: application/json

                  HTTP status code 500

                  Headers

                  • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                  Body

                  Type: application/json

                  Example:

                  {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

                  /exitcriteriastatuses

                  Kanban board exit criteria status from PlanMill

                  /exitcriteriastatuses get

                  get

                  Get a list of exitcriteriastatuses

                  get /exitcriteriastatuses

                  Get a list of exitcriteriastatuses

                  Secured by oauth_2.0

                  PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

                  • Request
                  • Response

                  Headers

                  • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                    See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                    nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                    timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                    signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                    Example:

                    user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
                  • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                    Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                    Example:

                    EUR

                  Query Parameters

                    HTTP status code 200

                    Body

                    Type: application/json

                    Schema:

                    {
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "description": "base schema for all exit criteria status entities",
  "oneOf": [
    {
      "type": "array",
      "items": { "$ref": "#/definitions/exitCriteriaStatusArray" }
    },
    {
      "$ref": "#/definitions/exitCriteriaStatusSingle"
    }
  ],
  "definitions": {
    "exitCriteriaStatusSingle": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": ["id", "exitCriterion"],
      "additionalProperties": false,
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Id of an exit criteria status"
        },
        "exitCriterion": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Id of an exit criteria"
        },
        "object": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Id of a resource type"
        },
        "status": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Status of a criteria"
        }
      }
    },
    "exitCriteriaStatusArray": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": ["id", "exitCriterion"],
      "additionalProperties": false,
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "ID of an exit criteria status"
        },
         "exitCriterion": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Id of an exit criteria"
        },
        "object": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Id of a resource type"
        },
        "status": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Status of a criteria"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

                    Example:

                    {
  "id": 4722,
  "exitCriterion": 4710,
  "object": 4715,
  "status": 2
}

                    HTTP status code 400

                    Headers

                    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                    Body

                    Type: application/json

                    Example:

                    {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

                    HTTP status code 401

                    Headers

                    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                    Body

                    Type: application/json

                    Example:

                    {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

                    HTTP status code 403

                    Headers

                    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                    Body

                    Type: application/json

                    Example:

                    {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

                    HTTP status code 404

                    Headers

                    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                    Body

                    Type: application/json

                    Example:

                    {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

                    HTTP status code 429

                    Headers

                    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                    Body

                    Type: application/json

                    HTTP status code 500

                    Headers

                    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                    Body

                    Type: application/json

                    Example:

                    {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

                    /exitcriteriastatuses/{id} get post delete

                    A single exitcriteriastatus in PlanMill.

                    get

                    View details of single exitcriteriastatus. See exitcriteriastatuses/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

                    post

                    Update an existing resource exitcriteriastatus to PlanMill. See exitcriteriastatuses/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

                    delete

                    Remove a exitcriteriastatus from PlanMill

                    get /exitcriteriastatuses/{id}

                    View details of single exitcriteriastatus. See exitcriteriastatuses/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

                    Secured by oauth_2.0

                    PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

                    • Request
                    • Response

                    URI Parameters

                    • id: required (string)

                    Headers

                    • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                      See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                      nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                      timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                      signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                      Example:

                      user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
                    • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                      Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                      Example:

                      EUR

                    HTTP status code 200

                    Body

                    Type: application/json

                    Example:

                    {
  "id": 4722,
  "exitCriterion": 4710,
  "object": 4715,
  "status": 2
}

                    Headers

                    • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                    • id: required (string)

                      See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                      nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                      timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                      user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=

                      Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                      Example:

                    exitcriteriastatus

  "id": 4722,

  "object": 4715,
  "status": 2

                      See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                      nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                      timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                      signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                      Example:

                      user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
                    • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                      Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                      EUR

                    /exitcriteriastatuses/{id}/comments get

                    Collection of available comments in PlanMill. This is a read-only collection

                    get

                    Get a list of comments

                    get /exitcriteriastatuses/{id}/comments

                    Get a list of comments

                    Secured by oauth_2.0

                    PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

                    • Request
                    • Response

                    URI Parameters

                    • id: required (string)

                    Headers

                    • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                      See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                      nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                      timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                      signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                      Example:

                      user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
                    • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                      Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                      Example:

                      EUR

                    Query Parameters

                      HTTP status code 200

                      Body

                      Type: application/json

                      Schema:

                      {
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "description": "base schema for all exit criteria status comments entities",
  "definitions": {
    "exitCriteriaStatusCommentsArray": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": ["personName", "id"],
      "additionalProperties": false,
      "properties": {
        "personName": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Name of a person"
        },
        "data": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Type of a resource"
        },
        "person": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Id of a person"
        },
        "status": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Status of an exit criteria"
        },
        "id": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Id of an exit criteria status comment"
        },
        "pictureLink": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Image link of a user"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

                      Example:

                      [
  {
    "personName": "Tester, Mikko",
    "data": "API call comment test",
    "person": 4600,
    "created": "2015-09-22T00:29:02.260+0300",
    "pictureLink": "",
    "id": 4655
  }
]

                      HTTP status code 400

                      Headers

                      • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                      Body

                      Type: application/json

                      {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
