                                                          Headers

                                                          • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                          Body

                                                          Type: application/json

                                                          HTTP status code 500

                                                          Headers

                                                          • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                          Body

                                                          Type: application/json

                                                          Example:

                                                          {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

                                                          /salesorders/{id} get post delete

                                                          A single salesorder in PlanMill.

                                                          get

                                                          View details of single salesorder. See salesorders/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

                                                          post

                                                          Update an existing resource salesorder to PlanMill. See salesorders/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

                                                          delete

                                                          Remove a salesorder from PlanMill

                                                          get /salesorders/{id}

                                                          View details of single salesorder. See salesorders/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

                                                          Secured by oauth_2.0

                                                          PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

                                                          • Request
                                                          • Response

                                                          URI Parameters

                                                          • id: required (string)

                                                          Headers

                                                          • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                                                            See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                                                            nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                                                            timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                                                            signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                                                            Example:

                                                            user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
                                                          • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                                                            Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                                                            Example:

                                                            EUR

                                                          HTTP status code 200

                                                          Body

                                                          Type: application/json

                                                          Example:

                                                          {
  "id": 12345,
  "request": null,
  "shippingAccount": null,
  "handlingFee": 0,
  "handlingFeeVat": 0,
  "project": null,
  "description": "",
  "delayInterest": 8,
  "operationalId": 1028,
  "type": 10,
  "billingAccount": 604204,
  "ourReference": "",
  "responsible": 498942,
  "contact": 604207,
  "invoiceItemSubtotaling": 0,
  "shippingReference": "",
  "noticeTime": 8,
  "quoteDate": null,
  "quoteUntil": null,
  "yourReference": "",
  "languageAndCurrency": "planmill_fi_eur.xsl",
  "contract": null,
  "opportunity": 605927,
  "reverseCharge": null,
  "name": "PlanMill PSA Cloud Service",
  "comment": "",
  "termsOfPayment": 14,
  "orderDate": null,
  "supplierContact": 498942,
  "status": 50
}

                                                          HTTP status code 400

                                                          Headers

                                                          • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                          Body

                                                          Type: application/json

                                                          Example:

                                                          {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

                                                          HTTP status code 401

                                                          Headers

                                                          • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                          Body

                                                          Type: application/json

                                                          Example:

                                                          {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

                                                          HTTP status code 403

                                                          Headers

                                                          • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                          Body

                                                          Type: application/json

                                                          Example:

                                                          {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

                                                          HTTP status code 404

                                                          Headers

                                                          • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                          Body

                                                          Type: application/json

                                                          Example:

                                                          {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

                                                          HTTP status code 429

                                                          Headers

                                                          • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                          Body

                                                          Type: application/json

                                                          HTTP status code 500

                                                          Headers

                                                          • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                          Body

                                                          Type: application/json

                                                          Example:

                                                          {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

                                                          post /salesorders/{id}

                                                          Update an existing resource salesorder to PlanMill. See salesorders/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

                                                          Secured by oauth_2.0

                                                          PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

                                                          • Request
                                                          • Response

                                                          URI Parameters

                                                          • id: required (string)

                                                          Headers

                                                          • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                                                            See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                                                            nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                                                            timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                                                            signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                                                            Example:

                                                            user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
                                                          • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                                                            Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                                                            Example:

                                                            EUR
                                                          • Content-Type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                            Example:

                                                            application/json;charset=UTF-8

                                                          Body

                                                          Type: application/json

                                                          Schema:

                                                          {
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "description": "base schema for all sales order entities",
  "oneOf": [
    {
      "type": "array",
      "items": { "$ref": "#/definitions/salesOrderArray" }
    },
    {
      "$ref": "#/definitions/salesOrderSingle"
    }
  ],
  "definitions": {
    "salesOrderSingle": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": ["name", "contact", "supplierContact"],
      "additionalProperties": false,
      "properties": {
        "request": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Id of a related request"
        },
        "shippingAccount": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Id of a shipping account"
        },
        "handlingFee": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Handling fee"
        },
        "handlingFeeVat": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Handling fee VAT"
        },
        "project": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Id of a related project"
        },
        "description": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Description of a sales order"
        },
        "delayInterest": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "Interest on delay of payment"
        },
        "operationalId": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Operational id of a sales order"
        },
        "type": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Type of a sales order"
        },
        "billingAccount": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Billing account id of a customer's account"
        },
        "ourReference": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Reference of a supplier"
        },
        "responsible": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Contact person of a customer's account"
        },
        "contact": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Contact person of a customer's account"
        },
        "invoiceItemSubtotaling": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Contact person of a customer's account"
        },
        "shippingReference": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Shipping department of a cusotomer"
        },
        "noticeTime": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Notice time of payment of a sales order"
        },
        "quoteDate": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "pattern": "(\\d{4})-([0][1-9]|[1][0-2])-([0][1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|[3][0-1])T([0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]).(\\d{3})((\\+|\\-)([0-9]|[0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3])([0-5][0-9]))"
        },
        "quoteUntil": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "pattern": "(\\d{4})-([0][1-9]|[1][0-2])-([0][1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|[3][0-1])T([0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]).(\\d{3})((\\+|\\-)([0-9]|[0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3])([0-5][0-9]))"
        },
        "yourReference": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Reference of a customer"
        },
        "languaeAndCurrency": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Language and currency of a sales order"
        },
        "contract": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Id of a related contract"
        },
        "opportunity": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Id of a related opportunity"
        },
        "reverseCharge": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Reverse charge"
        },
        "name": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Name of a sales order"
        },
        "comment": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Comment of a sales order"
        },
        "termsOfPayment": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Terms of payment of a sales order"
        },
        "orderDate": {
          "type": [ "string", "null" ],
          "pattern": "(\\d{4})-([0][1-9]|[1][0-2])-([0][1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|[3][0-1])T([0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]).(\\d{3})((\\+|\\-)([0-9]|[0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3])([0-5][0-9]))",
          "description": "Ordered date of a sales order"
        },
        "supplierContact": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Supplier contact person id of a sales order"
        },
        "status": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Status of a sales order"
        }
      }
    },
    "salesOrderArray": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": ["name", "contact", "supplierContact"],
      "additionalProperties": false,
      "properties": {
        "shippingAccountName": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Name of a shipping account"
        },
        "shippingAccount": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Id of a shipping account"
        },
        "accountName": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Name of a cutomer's account"
        },
        "VAT": {
          "type": ["string", "integer", "null"],
          "description": "VAT reg. no. of a cutomer's account"
        },
        "delayInterest": {
          "type": ["number", "null"],
          "description": "Interest on delay of payment"
        },
        "operationalId": {
          "type": ["string", "integer"],
          "description": "Operational id of a sales order"
        },
        "billingAccount": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Billing account id of a customer's account"
        },
        "totalVAT": {
          "type": ["number", "null"],
          "description": "VAT amount"
        },
        "contact": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Contact person of a customer's account"
        },
        "supplier": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Id of a supplier's account"
        },
        "responsible": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Sales executive person's id of a sales order"
        },
        "contractName": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Name of a contract"
        },
        "id": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Id of a sales order"
        },
        "responsibleName": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Sales executive person's name of a sales order"
        },
        "quoteDate": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "pattern": "(\\d{4})-([0][1-9]|[1][0-2])-([0][1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|[3][0-1])T([0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]).(\\d{3})((\\+|\\-)([0-9]|[0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3])([0-5][0-9]))",
          "description": "Start date of a quote"
        },
        "supplierName": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Name of a supplier contact person"
        },
        "totalIncludeVAT": {
          "type": ["number", "null"],
          "description": "Total amount including VAT"
        },
        "quoteUntil": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "pattern": "(\\d{4})-([0][1-9]|[1][0-2])-([0][1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|[3][0-1])T([0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]).(\\d{3})((\\+|\\-)([0-9]|[0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3])([0-5][0-9]))",
          "description": "Finish date of a quote"
        },
        "invoiceAppendix": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Invoice appendix"
        },
        "created": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "pattern": "(\\d{4})-([0][1-9]|[1][0-2])-([0][1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|[3][0-1])T([0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]).(\\d{3})((\\+|\\-)([0-9]|[0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3])([0-5][0-9]))"
        },
        "name": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Name of a sales order"
        },
        "billingAccountName": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Name of a customer's billing account"
        },
        "projectName": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Name of a project related to a sales order"
        },
        "supplierContact": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Name of a supplier contact person"
        },
        "orderDate": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "pattern": "(\\d{4})-([0][1-9]|[1][0-2])-([0][1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|[3][0-1])T([0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]).(\\d{3})((\\+|\\-)([0-9]|[0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3])([0-5][0-9]))",
          "description": "Ordered date of a sales order"
        },
        "account": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Id of a cutomer's account"
        },
        "status": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Status of a sales order"
        },
        "totalExcludeVAT": {
          "type": ["number", "null"],
          "description": "Total amount excluding VAT"
        },
        "termsOfPayment": {
          "type":  ["number", "null"],
          "description": "Terms of payment"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

                                                          Example:

                                                          {
  "id": 12345,
  "request": null,
  "shippingAccount": null,
  "handlingFee": 0,
  "handlingFeeVat": 0,
  "project": null,
  "description": "",
  "delayInterest": 8,
  "operationalId": 1028,
  "type": 10,
  "billingAccount": 604204,
  "ourReference": "",
  "responsible": 498942,
  "contact": 604207,
  "invoiceItemSubtotaling": 0,
  "shippingReference": "",
  "noticeTime": 8,
  "quoteDate": null,
  "quoteUntil": null,
  "yourReference": "",
  "languageAndCurrency": "planmill_fi_eur.xsl",
  "contract": null,
  "opportunity": 605927,
  "reverseCharge": null,
  "name": "PlanMill PSA Cloud Service",
  "comment": "",
  "termsOfPayment": 14,
  "orderDate": null,
  "supplierContact": 498942,
  "status": 50
}

                                                          HTTP status code 204

                                                          No HTTP body returned

                                                          HTTP status code 400

                                                          Headers

                                                          • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                          Body

                                                          Type: application/json

                                                          Example:

                                                          {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

                                                          HTTP status code 401

                                                          Headers

                                                          • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                          Body

                                                          Type: application/json

                                                          Example:

                                                          {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

                                                          HTTP status code 403

                                                          Headers

                                                          • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                          Body

                                                          Type: application/json

                                                          Example:

                                                          {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

                                                          HTTP status code 404

                                                          Headers

                                                          • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                          Body

                                                          Type: application/json

                                                          Example:

                                                          {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

                                                          HTTP status code 429

                                                          Headers

                                                          • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                          Body

                                                          Type: application/json

                                                          HTTP status code 500

                                                          Headers

                                                          • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                          Body

                                                          Type: application/json

                                                          Example:

                                                          {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

                                                          delete /salesorders/{id}

                                                          Remove a salesorder from PlanMill

                                                          Secured by oauth_2.0

                                                          PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

                                                          • Request
                                                          • Response

                                                          URI Parameters

                                                          • id: required (string)

                                                          Headers

                                                          • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                                                            See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                                                            nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                                                            timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                                                            signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                                                            Example:

                                                            user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
                                                          • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                                                            Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                                                            Example:

                                                            EUR

                                                          HTTP status code 204

                                                          No HTTP body returned

                                                          HTTP status code 400

                                                          Headers

                                                          • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                          Body

                                                          Type: application/json

                                                          Example:

                                                          {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

                                                          HTTP status code 401

                                                          Headers

                                                          • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                          Body

                                                          Type: application/json

                                                          Example:

                                                          {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

                                                          HTTP status code 403

                                                          Headers

                                                          • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                          Body

                                                          Type: application/json

                                                          Example:

                                                          {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

                                                          HTTP status code 404

                                                          Headers

                                                          • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                          Body

                                                          Type: application/json

                                                          Example:

                                                          {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

                                                          HTTP status code 429

                                                          Headers

                                                          • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                          Body

                                                          Type: application/json

                                                          HTTP status code 500

                                                          Headers

                                                          • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                          Body

                                                          Type: application/json

                                                          Example:

                                                          {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

                                                          /salesorders/{id}/attachments get

                                                          Collection of available attachments in PlanMill. This is a read-only collection

                                                          get

                                                          Get a list of attachments

                                                          get /salesorders/{id}/attachments

                                                          Get a list of attachments

                                                          Secured by oauth_2.0

                                                          PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

                                                          • Request
                                                          • Response

                                                          URI Parameters

                                                          • id: required (string)

                                                          Headers

                                                          • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                                                            See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                                                            nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                                                            timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                                                            signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                                                            Example:

                                                            user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
                                                          • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                                                            Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                                                            Example:

                                                            EUR

                                                          Query Parameters

                                                            HTTP status code 200

                                                            Body

                                                            Type: application/json

                                                            Example:

                                                            [
  {
    "size": 56,
    "createdBy": 2848153,
    "created": "2015-09-02T16:45:25.877+0300",
    "name": "attached_file.txt",
    "modified": "2015-09-02T16:45:23.353+0300",
    "id": 2848174
  },
  {
    "size": 56,
    "createdBy": 2848153,
    "created": "2015-09-02T16:45:25.877+0300",
    "name": "attached_file_delete.txt",
    "modified": "2015-09-02T16:45:23.353+0300",
    "id": 2848175
  }
]

                                                            HTTP status code 400

                                                            Headers

                                                            • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                            Body

                                                            Type: application/json

                                                            Example:

                                                            {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

                                                            HTTP status code 401

                                                            Headers

                                                            • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                            Body

                                                            Type: application/json

                                                            Example:

                                                            {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

                                                            HTTP status code 403

                                                            Headers

                                                            • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                            Body

                                                            Type: application/json

                                                            Example:

                                                            {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

                                                            HTTP status code 404

                                                            Headers

                                                            • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                            Body

                                                            Type: application/json

                                                            Example:

                                                            {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

                                                            HTTP status code 429

                                                            Headers

                                                            • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                            Body

                                                            Type: application/json

                                                            HTTP status code 500

                                                            Headers

                                                            • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                            Body

                                                            Type: application/json

                                                            Example:

                                                            {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

                                                            /salesorders/{id}/attachments/{id} put get delete

                                                            put
                                                            get

                                                            View details of single attachment

                                                            delete

                                                            Remove a attachment from PlanMill

                                                            put /salesorders/{id}/attachments/{id}

                                                            Secured by oauth_2.0

                                                            PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

                                                            • Request
                                                            • Response

                                                            URI Parameters

                                                            • id: required (string)
                                                            • id: required (string)

                                                            Headers

                                                            • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                                                              See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                                                              nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                                                              timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                                                              signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                                                              Example:

                                                              user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
                                                            • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                                                              Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                                                              Example:

                                                              EUR
                                                            • Content-Type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                              Example:

                                                              application/json;charset=UTF-8

                                                            HTTP status code 204

                                                            No HTTP body returned

                                                            HTTP status code 400

                                                            Headers

                                                            • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                            Body

                                                            Type: application/json

                                                            Example:

                                                            {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

                                                            HTTP status code 401

                                                            Headers

                                                            • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                            Body

                                                            Type: application/json

                                                            Example:

                                                            {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

                                                            HTTP status code 403

                                                            Headers

                                                            • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                            Body

                                                            Type: application/json

                                                            Example:

                                                            {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

                                                            HTTP status code 404

                                                            Headers

                                                            • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                            Body

                                                            Type: application/json

                                                            Example:

                                                            {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

                                                            HTTP status code 429

                                                            Headers

                                                            • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                            Body

                                                            Type: application/json

                                                            HTTP status code 500

                                                            Headers

                                                            • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                            Body

                                                            Type: application/json

                                                            Example:

                                                            {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

                                                            get /salesorders/{id}/attachments/{id}

                                                            View details of single attachment

                                                            Secured by oauth_2.0

                                                            PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

                                                            • Request
                                                            • Response

                                                            URI Parameters

                                                            • id: required (string)
                                                            • id: required (string)

                                                            Headers

                                                            • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                                                              See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                                                              nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                                                              timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                                                              signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                                                              Example:

                                                              user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
                                                            • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                                                              Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                                                              Example:

                                                              EUR

                                                            HTTP status code 200

                                                            Body

                                                            Type: application/json

                                                            Example:

                                                            Contents of file

                                                            HTTP status code 400

                                                            Headers

                                                            • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                            Body

                                                            Type: application/json

                                                            Example:

                                                            {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

                                                            HTTP status code 401

                                                            Headers

                                                            • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                            Body

                                                            Type: application/json

                                                            Example:

                                                            {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

                                                            HTTP status code 403

                                                            Headers

                                                            • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                            Body

                                                            Type: application/json

                                                            Example:

                                                            {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

                                                            HTTP status code 404

                                                            Headers

                                                            • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                            Body

                                                            Type: application/json

                                                            Example:

                                                            {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

                                                            HTTP status code 429

                                                            Headers

                                                            • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                            Body

                                                            Type: application/json

                                                            HTTP status code 500

                                                            Headers

                                                            • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                            Body

                                                            Type: application/json

                                                            Example:

                                                            {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

                                                            delete /salesorders/{id}/attachments/{id}

                                                            Remove a attachment from PlanMill

                                                            Secured by oauth_2.0

                                                            PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

                                                            • Request
                                                            • Response

                                                            URI Parameters

                                                            • id: required (string)
                                                            • id: required (string)

                                                            Headers

                                                            • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                                                              See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                                                              nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                                                              timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                                                              signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                                                              Example:

                                                              user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
                                                            • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                                                              Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                                                              Example:

                                                              EUR

                                                            HTTP status code 204

                                                            No HTTP body returned

                                                            HTTP status code 400

                                                            Headers

                                                            • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                            Body

                                                            Type: application/json

                                                            Example:

                                                            {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

                                                            HTTP status code 401

                                                            Headers

                                                            • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                            Body

                                                            Type: application/json

                                                            Example:

                                                            {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

                                                            HTTP status code 403

                                                            Headers

                                                            • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                            Body

                                                            Type: application/json

                                                            Example:

                                                            {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

                                                            HTTP status code 404

                                                            Headers

                                                            • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                            Body

                                                            Type: application/json

                                                            Example:

                                                            {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

                                                            HTTP status code 429

                                                            Headers

                                                            • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                            Body

                                                            Type: application/json

                                                            HTTP status code 500

                                                            Headers

                                                            • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                            Body

                                                            Type: application/json

                                                            Example:

                                                            {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

                                                            /salesorders/{id}/meta get

                                                            Get meta information for the updatable fields of the sales orders

                                                            get

                                                            View details of single meta

                                                            get /salesorders/{id}/meta

                                                            View details of single meta

                                                            Secured by oauth_2.0

                                                            PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

                                                            • Request
                                                            • Response

                                                            URI Parameters

                                                            • id: required (string)

                                                            Headers

                                                            • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                                                              See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                                                              nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                                                              timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                                                              signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                                                              Example:

                                                              user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
                                                            • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                                                              Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                                                              Example:

                                                              EUR

                                                            Type: application/json
