                                                            HTTP status code 400

                                                            Headers

                                                            • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                            Body

                                                            Type: application/json

                                                            Example:

                                                            {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

                                                            HTTP status code 401

                                                            Headers

                                                            • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                            Body

                                                            Type: application/json

                                                            Example:

                                                            {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

                                                            HTTP status code 403

                                                            Headers

                                                            • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                            Body

                                                            Type: application/json

                                                            Example:

                                                            {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

                                                            HTTP status code 404

                                                            Headers

                                                            • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                            Body

                                                            Type: application/json

                                                            Example:

                                                            {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

                                                            HTTP status code 429

                                                            Headers

                                                            • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                            Body

                                                            Type: application/json

                                                            HTTP status code 500

                                                            Headers

                                                            • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                            Body

                                                            Type: application/json

                                                            Example:

                                                            {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

                                                            /salesorders/{id}/items get post

                                                            Collection of available items in PlanMill. See items/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

                                                            get

                                                            Get a list of sales order items. See salesorder/{id}/items/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

                                                            post

                                                            Add a new sales order item to PlanMill or update existing (if id is given). See opportunities/{id}/items/meta for list of columns and formats

                                                            get /salesorders/{id}/items

                                                            Get a list of sales order items. See salesorder/{id}/items/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

                                                            Secured by oauth_2.0

                                                            PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

                                                            • Request
                                                            • Response

                                                            URI Parameters

                                                            • id: required (string)

                                                            Headers

                                                            • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                                                              See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                                                              nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                                                              timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                                                              signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                                                              Example:

                                                              user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
                                                            • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                                                              Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                                                              Example:

                                                              EUR

                                                            Query Parameters

                                                              HTTP status code 200

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              Schema:

                                                              {
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "description": "base schema for all sales order item entities",
  "oneOf": [
    {
      "type": "array",
      "items": { "$ref": "#/definitions/salesorderitemArray" }
    },
    {
    
      "$ref": "#/definitions/salesorderitemSingle"
    }
  ],
  "definitions": {
    "salesorderitemSingle": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": [ "name", "salesorder", "billingType" ],
      "properties": {
        "invoiceProcess": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "SalesOrder item invoice process"
        },
        "generatePriceType": {
          "type": ["integer","null"],
          "description": "Sales order item price type"
        },
        "VAT": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item VAT value"
        },
        "revenueType": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item revenue type: 0= Own New License, 1=Own Maintenance License, 2=3rd Party New License, 3=3rd Party Maintenance License, 4=Services, 5=Hoisting,6=Travel Expenses, 7=Other, 8=Subscription, 9=3rd Party Subscription"          
        },
        "discount": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item discount"
        },
        "orderStatus":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item order status"
        },
        "description":{
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item description"
        },
        "validFrom":{
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item valid start date",
          "pattern": "(\\d{4})-([0][1-9]|[1][0-2])-([0][1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|[3][0-1])T([0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]).(\\d{3})((\\+|\\-)([0-9]|[0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3])([0-5][0-9]))"
        },
        "operationalId":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item operational id"
        },
        "salesorder":{
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Sales order that the sales order item belongs to"
        },
        "competence":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item competence"
        },
        "sellingPrice":{
          "type": ["number", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item selling price"
        },
        "warrantyPeriod":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item warranty period"
        },
        "billingType":{
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Sales order item billing type"
        },
        "contractItem":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item contract item"
        },
        "product":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item product id"
        },
        "salesAccount":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item account"
        },
        "quantity":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item quantity"
        },
        "invoicingPeriod":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item invoicing period type"
        },
        "costCenter":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description":"Sales order item cost center"
        },
        "unit":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item unit value"
        },
        "task":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item task id"
        },
        "person": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description":"Sales order item person id"
        },
        "name": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Sales order item name"
        },
        "validUntil":{
          "type":["string", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item ending valid date",
          "pattern": "(\\d{4})-([0][1-9]|[1][0-2])-([0][1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|[3][0-1])T([0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]).(\\d{3})((\\+|\\-)([0-9]|[0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3])([0-5][0-9]))"
        },
        "selfCost": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item self cost"
        }
      }
    },
    "salesorderitemArray": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": [ "id","name", "salesorder", "billingType" ],
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "sales order item id"
        },
        "invoiceProcess": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "SalesOrder item invoice process"
        },
        "generatePriceType": {
          "type": ["integer","null"],
          "description": "Sales order item price type"
        },
        "VAT": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item VAT value"
        },
        "revenueType": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item revenue type: 0= Own New License, 1=Own Maintenance License, 2=3rd Party New License, 3=3rd Party Maintenance License, 4=Services, 5=Hoisting,6=Travel Expenses, 7=Other, 8=Subscription, 9=3rd Party Subscription"          
        },
        "discount": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item discount"
        },
        "orderStatus":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item order status"
        },
        "description":{
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item description"
        },
        "validFrom":{
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item valid start date",
          "pattern": "(\\d{4})-([0][1-9]|[1][0-2])-([0][1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|[3][0-1])T([0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]).(\\d{3})((\\+|\\-)([0-9]|[0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3])([0-5][0-9]))"
        },
        "operationalId":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item operational id"
        },
        "salesorder":{
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Sales order that the sales order item belongs to"
        },
        "competence":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item competence"
        },
        "sellingPrice":{
          "type": ["number", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item selling price"
        },
        "warrantyPeriod":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item warranty period"
        },
        "billingType":{
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Sales order item billing type"
        },
        "contractItem":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item contract item"
        },
        "product":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item product id"
        },
        "salesAccount":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item account"
        },
        "quantity":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item quantity"
        },
        "invoicingPeriod":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item invoicing period type"
        },
        "costCenter":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description":"Sales order item cost center"
        },
        "unit":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item unit value"
        },
        "task":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item task id"
        },
        "person": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description":"Sales order item person id"
        },
        "name": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Sales order item name"
        },
        "validUntil":{
          "type":["string", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item ending valid date",
          "pattern": "(\\d{4})-([0][1-9]|[1][0-2])-([0][1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|[3][0-1])T([0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]).(\\d{3})((\\+|\\-)([0-9]|[0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3])([0-5][0-9]))"
        },
        "selfCost": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item self cost"
        }
      }
    }  
  }
}

                                                              Example:

                                                              [
  {
    "invoiceProcess": 3,
    "generatePriceType": 0,
    "VAT": 24,
    "discount": 10,
    "orderStatus": null,
    "validFrom": "2015-09-09T00:00:00.000+0300",
    "salesorder": 4229,
    "competence": 4263,
    "sellingPrice": 16.67,
    "warrantyPeriod": 360,
    "billingType": 1,
    "id": 4230,
    "revenuetype": 4,
    "contractItem": 4265,
    "product": 2394,
    "salesAccount": 4,
    "quantity": 1,
    "invoicingPeriod": 3,
    "costCenter": null,
    "contractPeriod": 140,
    "unit": 2,
    "task": 4158,
    "person": 2365,
    "name": "PlanMill test product",
    "validUntil": "2017-09-08T00:00:00.000+0300",
    "selfCost": 0
  },
  {
    "invoiceProcess": null,
    "generatePriceType": 0,
    "VAT": 20,
    "discount": 0,
    "orderStatus": null,
    "validFrom": "2015-06-30T12:53:00.000+0300",
    "salesorder": 2843784,
    "competence": null,
    "sellingPrice": 140,
    "warrantyPeriod": null,
    "billingType": 2,
    "id": 2843787,
    "revenuetype": 4,
    "contractItem": null,
    "product": 2843775,
    "salesAccount": null,
    "quantity": 3,
    "invoicingPeriod": -13,
    "costCenter": null,
    "contractPeriod": null,
    "unit": 6,
    "task": null,
    "person": null,
    "name": "Test sales order item",
    "validUntil": null,
    "selfCost": 0
  }
]

                                                              HTTP status code 400

                                                              Headers

                                                              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              Example:

                                                              {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

                                                              HTTP status code 401

                                                              Headers

                                                              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              Example:

                                                              {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

                                                              HTTP status code 403

                                                              Headers

                                                              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              Example:

                                                              {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

                                                              HTTP status code 404

                                                              Headers

                                                              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              Example:

                                                              {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

                                                              HTTP status code 429

                                                              Headers

                                                              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              HTTP status code 500

                                                              Headers

                                                              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              Example:

                                                              {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

                                                              post /salesorders/{id}/items

                                                              Add a new sales order item to PlanMill or update existing (if id is given). See opportunities/{id}/items/meta for list of columns and formats

                                                              Secured by oauth_2.0

                                                              PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

                                                              • Request
                                                              • Response

                                                              URI Parameters

                                                              • id: required (string)

                                                              Headers

                                                              • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                                                                See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                                                                nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                                                                timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                                                                signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                                                                Example:

                                                                user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
                                                              • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                                                                Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                                                                Example:

                                                                EUR
                                                              • Content-Type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                Example:

                                                                application/json;charset=UTF-8

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              Schema:

                                                              {
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "description": "base schema for all sales order item entities",
  "oneOf": [
    {
      "type": "array",
      "items": { "$ref": "#/definitions/salesorderitemArray" }
    },
    {
    
      "$ref": "#/definitions/salesorderitemSingle"
    }
  ],
  "definitions": {
    "salesorderitemSingle": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": [ "name", "salesorder", "billingType" ],
      "properties": {
        "invoiceProcess": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "SalesOrder item invoice process"
        },
        "generatePriceType": {
          "type": ["integer","null"],
          "description": "Sales order item price type"
        },
        "VAT": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item VAT value"
        },
        "revenueType": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item revenue type: 0= Own New License, 1=Own Maintenance License, 2=3rd Party New License, 3=3rd Party Maintenance License, 4=Services, 5=Hoisting,6=Travel Expenses, 7=Other, 8=Subscription, 9=3rd Party Subscription"          
        },
        "discount": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item discount"
        },
        "orderStatus":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item order status"
        },
        "description":{
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item description"
        },
        "validFrom":{
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item valid start date",
          "pattern": "(\\d{4})-([0][1-9]|[1][0-2])-([0][1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|[3][0-1])T([0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]).(\\d{3})((\\+|\\-)([0-9]|[0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3])([0-5][0-9]))"
        },
        "operationalId":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item operational id"
        },
        "salesorder":{
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Sales order that the sales order item belongs to"
        },
        "competence":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item competence"
        },
        "sellingPrice":{
          "type": ["number", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item selling price"
        },
        "warrantyPeriod":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item warranty period"
        },
        "billingType":{
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Sales order item billing type"
        },
        "contractItem":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item contract item"
        },
        "product":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item product id"
        },
        "salesAccount":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item account"
        },
        "quantity":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item quantity"
        },
        "invoicingPeriod":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item invoicing period type"
        },
        "costCenter":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description":"Sales order item cost center"
        },
        "unit":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item unit value"
        },
        "task":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item task id"
        },
        "person": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description":"Sales order item person id"
        },
        "name": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Sales order item name"
        },
        "validUntil":{
          "type":["string", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item ending valid date",
          "pattern": "(\\d{4})-([0][1-9]|[1][0-2])-([0][1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|[3][0-1])T([0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]).(\\d{3})((\\+|\\-)([0-9]|[0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3])([0-5][0-9]))"
        },
        "selfCost": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item self cost"
        }
      }
    },
    "salesorderitemArray": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": [ "id","name", "salesorder", "billingType" ],
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "sales order item id"
        },
        "invoiceProcess": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "SalesOrder item invoice process"
        },
        "generatePriceType": {
          "type": ["integer","null"],
          "description": "Sales order item price type"
        },
        "VAT": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item VAT value"
        },
        "revenueType": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item revenue type: 0= Own New License, 1=Own Maintenance License, 2=3rd Party New License, 3=3rd Party Maintenance License, 4=Services, 5=Hoisting,6=Travel Expenses, 7=Other, 8=Subscription, 9=3rd Party Subscription"          
        },
        "discount": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item discount"
        },
        "orderStatus":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item order status"
        },
        "description":{
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item description"
        },
        "validFrom":{
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item valid start date",
          "pattern": "(\\d{4})-([0][1-9]|[1][0-2])-([0][1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|[3][0-1])T([0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]).(\\d{3})((\\+|\\-)([0-9]|[0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3])([0-5][0-9]))"
        },
        "operationalId":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item operational id"
        },
        "salesorder":{
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Sales order that the sales order item belongs to"
        },
        "competence":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item competence"
        },
        "sellingPrice":{
          "type": ["number", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item selling price"
        },
        "warrantyPeriod":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item warranty period"
        },
        "billingType":{
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Sales order item billing type"
        },
        "contractItem":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item contract item"
        },
        "product":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item product id"
        },
        "salesAccount":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item account"
        },
        "quantity":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item quantity"
        },
        "invoicingPeriod":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item invoicing period type"
        },
        "costCenter":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description":"Sales order item cost center"
        },
        "unit":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item unit value"
        },
        "task":{
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item task id"
        },
        "person": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description":"Sales order item person id"
        },
        "name": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Sales order item name"
        },
        "validUntil":{
          "type":["string", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item ending valid date",
          "pattern": "(\\d{4})-([0][1-9]|[1][0-2])-([0][1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|[3][0-1])T([0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]).(\\d{3})((\\+|\\-)([0-9]|[0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3])([0-5][0-9]))"
        },
        "selfCost": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Sales order item self cost"
        }
      }
    }  
  }
}

                                                              Example:

                                                              {
  "invoiceProcess": 3,
  "generatePriceType": 0,
  "VAT": 24,
  "revenueType": 4,
  "discount": 10,
  "orderStatus": null,
  "description": "<p>test description</p>",
  "validFrom": "2015-09-09T00:00:00.000+0300",
  "operationalId": "",
  "salesorder": 4229,
  "competence": 4263,
  "sellingPrice": 16.67,
  "warrantyPeriod": 360,
  "billingType": 1,
  "contractItem": 4265,
  "product": 2394,
  "salesAccount": 4,
  "quantity": 1,
  "invoicingPeriod": 3,
  "costCenter": null,
  "contractPeriod": 140,
  "unit": 2,
  "task": 4158,
  "person": 2365,
  "name": "Sales order item 1",
  "validUntil": "2017-09-08T00:00:00.000+0300",
  "selfCost": 0
}

                                                              HTTP status code 201

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              Example:

                                                              { "id" : 123456 }

                                                              HTTP status code 400

                                                              Headers

                                                              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              Example:

                                                              {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

                                                              HTTP status code 401

                                                              Headers

                                                              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              Example:

                                                              {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

                                                              HTTP status code 403

                                                              Headers

                                                              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              Example:

                                                              {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

                                                              HTTP status code 404

                                                              Headers

                                                              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              Example:

                                                              {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

                                                              HTTP status code 429

                                                              Headers

                                                              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              HTTP status code 500

                                                              Headers

                                                              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              Example:

                                                              {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

                                                              /salesorders/{id}/items/{id} get post delete

                                                              A single item in PlanMill.

                                                              get

                                                              View details of single item of single sales order item.

                                                              post

                                                              Update an existing resource single item of single sales order to PlanMill.

                                                              delete

                                                              Remove a item from PlanMill

                                                              get /salesorders/{id}/items/{id}

                                                              View details of single item of single sales order item.

                                                              Secured by oauth_2.0

                                                              PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

                                                              • Request
                                                              • Response

                                                              URI Parameters

                                                              • id: required (string)
                                                              • id: required (string)

                                                              Headers

                                                              • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                                                                See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                                                                nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                                                                timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                                                                signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                                                                Example:

                                                                user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
                                                              • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                                                                Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                                                                Example:

                                                                EUR

                                                              HTTP status code 200

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              Example:

                                                              {
  "invoiceProcess": 3,
  "generatePriceType": 0,
  "VAT": 24,
  "revenueType": 4,
  "discount": 10,
  "orderStatus": null,
  "description": "<p>test description</p>",
  "validFrom": "2015-09-09T00:00:00.000+0300",
  "operationalId": "",
  "salesorder": 4229,
  "competence": 4263,
  "sellingPrice": 16.67,
  "warrantyPeriod": 360,
  "billingType": 1,
  "contractItem": 4265,
  "product": 2394,
  "salesAccount": 4,
  "quantity": 1,
  "invoicingPeriod": 3,
  "costCenter": null,
  "contractPeriod": 140,
  "unit": 2,
  "task": 4158,
  "person": 2365,
  "name": "Sales order item 1",
  "validUntil": "2017-09-08T00:00:00.000+0300",
  "selfCost": 0
}

                                                              HTTP status code 400

                                                              Headers

                                                              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              Example:

                                                              {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

                                                              HTTP status code 401

                                                              Headers

                                                              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              Example:

                                                              {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

                                                              HTTP status code 403

                                                              Headers

                                                              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              Example:

                                                              {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

                                                              HTTP status code 404

                                                              Headers

                                                              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              Example:

                                                              {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

                                                              HTTP status code 429

                                                              Headers

                                                              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              HTTP status code 500

                                                              Headers

                                                              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              Example:

                                                              {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

                                                              post /salesorders/{id}/items/{id}

                                                              Update an existing resource single item of single sales order to PlanMill.

                                                              Secured by oauth_2.0

                                                              PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

                                                              • Request
                                                              • Response

                                                              URI Parameters

                                                              • id: required (string)
                                                              • id: required (string)

                                                              Headers

                                                              • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                                                                See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                                                                nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                                                                timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                                                                signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                                                                Example:

                                                                user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
                                                              • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                                                                Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                                                                Example:

                                                                EUR
                                                              • Content-Type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                Example:

                                                                application/json;charset=UTF-8

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              Schema:

                                                              item

                                                              Example:

                                                              {
  "invoiceProcess": 3,
  "generatePriceType": 0,
  "VAT": 24,
  "revenueType": 4,
  "discount": 10,
  "orderStatus": null,
  "description": "<p>test description</p>",
  "validFrom": "2015-09-09T00:00:00.000+0300",
  "operationalId": "",
  "salesorder": 4229,
  "competence": 4263,
  "sellingPrice": 16.67,
  "warrantyPeriod": 360,
  "billingType": 1,
  "contractItem": 4265,
  "product": 2394,
  "salesAccount": 4,
  "quantity": 1,
  "invoicingPeriod": 3,
  "costCenter": null,
  "contractPeriod": 140,
  "unit": 2,
  "task": 4158,
  "person": 2365,
  "name": "Sales order item 1",
  "validUntil": "2017-09-08T00:00:00.000+0300",
  "selfCost": 0
}

                                                              HTTP status code 204

                                                              No HTTP body returned

                                                              HTTP status code 400

                                                              Headers

                                                              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              Example:

                                                              {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

                                                              HTTP status code 401

                                                              Headers

                                                              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              Example:

                                                              {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

                                                              HTTP status code 403

                                                              Headers

                                                              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              Example:

                                                              {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

                                                              HTTP status code 404

                                                              Headers

                                                              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              Example:

                                                              {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

                                                              HTTP status code 429

                                                              Headers

                                                              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              HTTP status code 500

                                                              Headers

                                                              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              Example:

                                                              {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

                                                              delete /salesorders/{id}/items/{id}

                                                              Remove a item from PlanMill

                                                              Secured by oauth_2.0

                                                              PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

                                                              • Request
                                                              • Response

                                                              URI Parameters

                                                              • id: required (string)
                                                              • id: required (string)

                                                              Headers

                                                              • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                                                                See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                                                                nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                                                                timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                                                                signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                                                                Example:

                                                                user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
                                                              • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                                                                Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                                                                Example:

                                                                EUR

                                                              HTTP status code 204

                                                              No HTTP body returned

                                                              HTTP status code 400

                                                              Headers

                                                              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              Example:

                                                              {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

                                                              HTTP status code 401

                                                              Headers

                                                              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              Example:

                                                              {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

                                                              HTTP status code 403

                                                              Headers

                                                              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              Example:

                                                              {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

                                                              HTTP status code 404

                                                              Headers

                                                              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              Example:

                                                              {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

                                                              HTTP status code 429

                                                              Headers

                                                              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              HTTP status code 500

                                                              Headers

                                                              • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                              /tasks/{id}

                                                              A single task in PlanMill.

                                                              /tasks/{id} get post delete

                                                              get

                                                              View details of single task. See tasks/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

                                                              post

                                                              Update an existing resource task to PlanMill. See tasks/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

                                                              delete

                                                              Remove a task from PlanMill

                                                              get /tasks/{id}

                                                              View details of single task. See tasks/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

                                                              Secured by oauth_2.0

                                                              PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

                                                              • Request
                                                              • Response

                                                              URI Parameters

                                                              • id: required (string)

                                                              Headers

                                                              • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                                                                See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                                                                nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                                                                timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                                                                signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                                                                Example:

                                                                user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
                                                              • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                                                                Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                                                                Example:

                                                                EUR

                                                              HTTP status code 200

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              Example:

                                                              {
  "unitPrice": 10,
  "dutyType": 2040,
  "parent": 3094,
  "targetEffort": 120,
  "start": "2015-09-08T09:00:00.000+0300",
  "tempFinish": "2015-09-08T16:30:00.000+0300",
  "originalFinish": "2015-09-08T16:30:00.000+0300",
  "priceType": null,
  "project": 3094,
  "wbs": "",
  "description": "<p>test description</p>",
  "finishOld": "2015-09-08T16:30:00.000+0300",
  "predecessorTask": null,
  "type": 100,
  "billableStatus": 2,
  "originalStart": "2015-09-08T09:00:00.000+0300",
  "name": "test task",
  "finish": "2015-09-08T16:30:00.000+0300",
  "id": 4139,
  "status": -1
}

                                                              post /tasks/{id}

                                                              Update an existing resource task to PlanMill. See tasks/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

                                                              Secured by oauth_2.0

                                                              PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

                                                              • Request
                                                              • Response

                                                              URI Parameters

                                                              • id: required (string)

                                                              Headers

                                                              • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                                                                See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                                                                nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                                                                timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                                                                signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                                                                Example:

                                                                user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
                                                              • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                                                                Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                                                                Example:

                                                                EUR
                                                              • Content-Type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                Example:

                                                                application/json;charset=UTF-8

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              Schema:

                                                              task

                                                              Example:

                                                              {
  "unitPrice": 10,
  "dutyType": 2040,
  "parent": 3094,
  "targetEffort": 120,
  "start": "2015-09-08T09:00:00.000+0300",
  "tempFinish": "2015-09-08T16:30:00.000+0300",
  "originalFinish": "2015-09-08T16:30:00.000+0300",
  "priceType": null,
  "project": 3094,
  "wbs": "",
  "description": "<p>test description</p>",
  "finishOld": "2015-09-08T16:30:00.000+0300",
  "predecessorTask": null,
  "type": 100,
  "billableStatus": 2,
  "originalStart": "2015-09-08T09:00:00.000+0300",
  "name": "test task",
  "finish": "2015-09-08T16:30:00.000+0300",
  "id": 4139,
  "status": -1
}

                                                              delete /tasks/{id}

                                                              Remove a task from PlanMill

                                                              Secured by oauth_2.0

                                                              PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

                                                              • Request
                                                              • Response

                                                              URI Parameters

                                                              • id: required (string)

                                                              Headers

                                                              • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                                                                See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                                                                nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                                                                timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                                                                signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                                                                Example:

                                                                user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
                                                              • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                                                                Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                                                                Example:

                                                                EUR

                                                              HTTP status code 204

                                                              No HTTP body returned

                                                              HTTP status code 400

                                                              Headers

  "code": "00003"

                                                              /tasks/{id}/meta get

                                                              Get meta information for the updatable fields of the task

                                                              get

                                                              View details of single meta

                                                              get /tasks/{id}/meta

                                                              View details of single meta

                                                              Secured by oauth_2.0

                                                              PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

                                                              • Request
                                                              • Response

                                                              URI Parameters

                                                              • id: required (string)

                                                              Headers

                                                              • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                                                                See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                                                                nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                                                                timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                                                                signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                                                                Example:

                                                                user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
                                                              • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                                                                Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                                                                Example:

                                                                EUR

                                                              HTTP status code 200

                                                              Body

                                                              Type: application/json

                                                              Example:

    "caption": "Name",

    "maxlength": "255",
    "values": null

    "maxlength": "10",
