  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

                                                                        HTTP status code 404

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

                                                                        HTTP status code 429

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        HTTP status code 500

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

                                                                        post /timereports

                                                                        Add a new timereport to PlanMill or update existing (if id is given). See timereports/meta for list of columns and formats

                                                                        Secured by oauth_2.0

                                                                        PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

                                                                        • Request
                                                                        • Response

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                                                                          See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                                                                          nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                                                                          timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                                                                          signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                                                                          Example:

                                                                          user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
                                                                        • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                                                                          Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                                                                          Example:

                                                                          EUR
                                                                        • Content-Type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                          Example:

                                                                          application/json;charset=UTF-8

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Schema:

                                                                        {
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "description": "base schema for all timereport entities",
  "oneOf": [
    {
      "type": "array",
      "items": { "$ref": "#/definitions/timereport" }
    },
    {
      "$ref": "#/definitions/timereport"
    }
  ],
  "definitions": {
    "timereport": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": ["start"],
      "anyOf": [
        {
          "required": ["amount"]
        },
        {
          "required": ["finish"]
        }
      ],
      "additionalProperties": false,
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Internal ID of a time report"
        },
        "start": {
          "type": "string",
          "pattern": "(\\d{4})-([0][1-9]|[1][0-2])-([0][1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|[3][0-1])T([0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]).(\\d{3})((\\+|\\-)([0-9]|[0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3])([0-5][0-9]))",
          "description": "only date part is used for saving time report unless clock times -mode is active in users role"
        },
        "finish": {
          "type": "string",
          "pattern": "(\\d{4})-([0][1-9]|[1][0-2])-([0][1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|[3][0-1])T([0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]).(\\d{3})((\\+|\\-)([0-9]|[0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3])([0-5][0-9]))"
        },
        "amount": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "Reported time in hours using decimals. 15 min = 0,25 hours"
        },
        "billableStatus": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "If task's status is billable, time report's status can be either billable or non-billable"
        },
        "billableAmount": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Billable amount of time report can be given separately, if reported amount affecting person's balance is different"
        },
        "billingComment": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Billing comment of a time report"
        },
        "comment": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Comments of a time report"
        },
        "dutyType": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Type of duty"
        },
        "overtimeAmount": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Time in minutes for amount of overtime work done"
        },
        "overtimeComment": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Comment for overtime work"
        },
        "project": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Id of project having task to report the time"
        },
        "remainingAmount": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Remaining amount of a time report"
        },
        "requireBillableComment": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Used in get requests to indicate if task requires a comment for timereport"
        },
        "status": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Status of a time report"
        },
        "person": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "User's id"
        },
        "task": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Id of task for which time is reported"
        },
        "totalReported": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Total reported time of time report"
        },
        "travelAmount": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Travel time in minutes"
        },
        "travelComment": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Comment for travel time"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "amount": 180,
  "start": "2015-09-08T17:30:00.000+0300",
  "totalReported": 180,
  "project": 4136,
  "billableStatus": 1,
  "requireBillableComment": 0,
  "remainingAmount": 120,
  "billableAmount": null,
  "task": 4143,
  "overtimeAmount": 60,
  "billingComment": null,
  "person": 3081,
  "finish": "2015-09-08T20:30:00.000+0300",
  "comment": "testing request",
  "overtimeComment": "hot bug fix",
  "id": 4156,
  "travelComment": "travelled to buy office stuff from market",
  "travelAmount": 60,
  "status": 0
}

                                                                        HTTP status code 201

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        { "id" : 123456 }

                                                                        HTTP status code 400

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

                                                                        HTTP status code 401

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

                                                                        HTTP status code 403

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

                                                                        HTTP status code 404

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

                                                                        HTTP status code 429

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        HTTP status code 500

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

                                                                        /timereports/meta get

                                                                        Get meta information for time reports. Includes resource's fields names and type and related filters.

                                                                        get

                                                                        View details of single meta

                                                                        get /timereports/meta

                                                                        View details of single meta

                                                                        Secured by oauth_2.0

                                                                        PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

                                                                        • Request
                                                                        • Response

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                                                                          See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                                                                          nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                                                                          timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                                                                          signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                                                                          Example:

                                                                          user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
                                                                        • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                                                                          Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                                                                          Example:

                                                                          EUR

                                                                        HTTP status code 200

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "filters": [
    {
      "name": "freetextsearch",
      "caption": ""
    },
    {
      "name": "status",
      "caption": "Status",
      "values": {
        "All": "-1",
        "Locked": "2",
        "Preliminary": "4",
        "Reported": "0",
        "Accepted": "1"
      }
    },
    {
      "name": "billableStatus",
      "caption": "Billable status",
      "values": {
        "All": "-1",
        "In billing": "4",
        "Billable": "1",
        "Invoiced": "6",
        "Draft invoice": "5",
        "Non-billable": "3"
      }
    },
    {
      "name": "project",
      "caption": "Project",
      "values": {
        "All": "-1",
        "abc": "2782852"
      }
    },
    {
      "name": "person",
      "caption": "Person",
      "values": {
        "Jim, Harris": "2752646",
        "Sara, Johnson": "580283",
        "Mike, Hike": "2828584"
      }
    },
    {
      "name": "period",
      "caption": "Period",
      "values": {
        "All": "0",
        "Last 180 days": "16",
        "This week": "30",
        "This and next FY": "7",
        "Last 14 days": "26",
        "This and next month": "24",
        "This and next week": "34",
        "Next 30 days": "17",
        "Next 180 days": "21",
        "This FY": "5",
        "Next FY": "6",
        "This and last month": "25",
        "This FQ": "1",
        "Last month": "11",
        "Last 30 days": "12",
        "Last FY": "8",
        "Today and tomorrow": "44",
        "This and last week": "32",
        "This and next FQ": "3",
        "Last FQ": "4",
        "Last 120 days": "15",
        "This and last FY": "23",
        "Last week": "31",
        "This month": "9",
        "Next 120 days": "20",
        "Yesterday": "41",
        "Last 60 days": "13",
        "Next week": "33",
        "Next 60 days": "18",
        "Tomorrow": "43",
        "Today": "40",
        "Today and yesterday": "42",
        "Next FQ": "2",
        "Next month": "10",
        "This & last FQ": "22",
        "Last 90 days": "14",
        "Next 90 days": "19"
      }
    },
    {
      "name": "interval",
      "calendar": "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ",
      "values": {
        "Date": "start"
      }
    },
    {
      "name": "rowcount",
      "caption": "Rows",
      "values": {
        "25": "25",
        "50": "50",
        "75": "75",
        "100": "100",
        "150": "150",
        "250": "250"
      }
    },
    {
      "name": "balance",
      "caption": "Balance"
    },
    {
      "name": "overtimebalance",
      "caption": "Overtime balance"
    }
  ],
  "fields": {
    "amount": {
      "format": "hour",
      "caption": "Reported"
    },
    "task": {
      "format": "text",
      "caption": "TimeReport.TaskId"
    },
    "billingComment": {
      "format": "text",
      "caption": "Invoice comment"
    },
    "person": {
      "format": "text",
      "caption": "Timereport.PersonId"
    },
    "start": {
      "format": "shortdate",
      "caption": "Date"
    },
    "project": {
      "format": "text",
      "caption": "PMVProject.Id"
    },
    "comment": {
      "format": "text",
      "caption": "Comment"
    },
    "finish": {
      "format": "mediumdate",
      "caption": "TimeReport.Finish"
    },
    "id": {
      "format": "text",
      "caption": "TimeReport.Id"
    },
    "billableStatus": {
      "format": "Enumeration values.Time report.Billable status",
      "caption": "Billable status"
    },
    "status": {
      "format": "texthtml",
      "caption": "Status"
    }
  }
}

                                                                        HTTP status code 400

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

                                                                        HTTP status code 401

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

                                                                        HTTP status code 403

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

                                                                        HTTP status code 404

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

                                                                        HTTP status code 429

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        HTTP status code 500

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

                                                                        /timereports/{id} get post delete

                                                                        A single timereport in PlanMill.

                                                                        get

                                                                        View details of single timereport. See timereports/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

                                                                        post

                                                                        Update an existing resource timereport to PlanMill. See timereports/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

                                                                        delete

                                                                        Remove a timereport from PlanMill

                                                                        get /timereports/{id}

                                                                        View details of single timereport. See timereports/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

                                                                        Secured by oauth_2.0

                                                                        PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

                                                                        • Request
                                                                        • Response

                                                                        URI Parameters

                                                                        • id: required (string)

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                                                                          See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                                                                          nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                                                                          timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                                                                          signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                                                                          Example:

                                                                          user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
                                                                        • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                                                                          Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                                                                          Example:

                                                                          EUR

                                                                        HTTP status code 200

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "amount": 180,
  "start": "2015-09-08T17:30:00.000+0300",
  "totalReported": 180,
  "project": 4136,
  "billableStatus": 1,
  "requireBillableComment": 0,
  "remainingAmount": 120,
  "billableAmount": null,
  "task": 4143,
  "overtimeAmount": 60,
  "billingComment": null,
  "person": 3081,
  "finish": "2015-09-08T20:30:00.000+0300",
  "comment": "testing request",
  "overtimeComment": "hot bug fix",
  "id": 4156,
  "travelComment": "travelled to buy office stuff from market",
  "travelAmount": 60,
  "status": 0
}

                                                                        HTTP status code 400

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

                                                                        HTTP status code 401

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

                                                                        HTTP status code 403

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

                                                                        HTTP status code 404

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

                                                                        HTTP status code 429

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        HTTP status code 500

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

                                                                        post /timereports/{id}

                                                                        Update an existing resource timereport to PlanMill. See timereports/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

                                                                        Secured by oauth_2.0

                                                                        PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

                                                                        • Request
                                                                        • Response

                                                                        URI Parameters

                                                                        • id: required (string)

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                                                                          See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                                                                          nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                                                                          timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                                                                          signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                                                                          Example:

                                                                          user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
                                                                        • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                                                                          Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                                                                          Example:

                                                                          EUR
                                                                        • Content-Type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                          Example:

                                                                          application/json;charset=UTF-8

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Schema:

                                                                        {
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "description": "base schema for all timereport entities",
  "oneOf": [
    {
      "type": "array",
      "items": { "$ref": "#/definitions/timereport" }
    },
    {
      "$ref": "#/definitions/timereport"
    }
  ],
  "definitions": {
    "timereport": {
      "type": "object",
      "required": ["start"],
      "anyOf": [
        {
          "required": ["amount"]
        },
        {
          "required": ["finish"]
        }
      ],
      "additionalProperties": false,
      "properties": {
        "id": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Internal ID of a time report"
        },
        "start": {
          "type": "string",
          "pattern": "(\\d{4})-([0][1-9]|[1][0-2])-([0][1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|[3][0-1])T([0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]).(\\d{3})((\\+|\\-)([0-9]|[0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3])([0-5][0-9]))",
          "description": "only date part is used for saving time report unless clock times -mode is active in users role"
        },
        "finish": {
          "type": "string",
          "pattern": "(\\d{4})-([0][1-9]|[1][0-2])-([0][1-9]|[1-2][0-9]|[3][0-1])T([0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]).(\\d{3})((\\+|\\-)([0-9]|[0][0-9]|[1][0-9]|[2][0-3])([0-5][0-9]))"
        },
        "amount": {
          "type": "number",
          "description": "Reported time in hours using decimals. 15 min = 0,25 hours"
        },
        "billableStatus": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "If task's status is billable, time report's status can be either billable or non-billable"
        },
        "billableAmount": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Billable amount of time report can be given separately, if reported amount affecting person's balance is different"
        },
        "billingComment": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Billing comment of a time report"
        },
        "comment": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Comments of a time report"
        },
        "dutyType": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Type of duty"
        },
        "overtimeAmount": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Time in minutes for amount of overtime work done"
        },
        "overtimeComment": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Comment for overtime work"
        },
        "project": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Id of project having task to report the time"
        },
        "remainingAmount": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Remaining amount of a time report"
        },
        "requireBillableComment": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Used in get requests to indicate if task requires a comment for timereport"
        },
        "status": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Status of a time report"
        },
        "person": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "User's id"
        },
        "task": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Id of task for which time is reported"
        },
        "totalReported": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Total reported time of time report"
        },
        "travelAmount": {
          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Travel time in minutes"
        },
        "travelComment": {
          "type": ["string", "null"],
          "description": "Comment for travel time"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "amount": 180,
  "start": "2015-09-08T17:30:00.000+0300",
  "totalReported": 180,
  "project": 4136,
  "billableStatus": 1,
  "requireBillableComment": 0,
  "remainingAmount": 120,
  "billableAmount": null,
  "task": 4143,
  "overtimeAmount": 60,
  "billingComment": null,
  "person": 3081,
  "finish": "2015-09-08T20:30:00.000+0300",
  "comment": "testing request",
  "overtimeComment": "hot bug fix",
  "id": 4156,
  "travelComment": "travelled to buy office stuff from market",
  "travelAmount": 60,
  "status": 0
}

                                                                        HTTP status code 204

                                                                        No HTTP body returned

                                                                        HTTP status code 400

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

                                                                        HTTP status code 401

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

                                                                        HTTP status code 403

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

                                                                        HTTP status code 404

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

                                                                        HTTP status code 429

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        HTTP status code 500

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

                                                                        delete /timereports/{id}

                                                                        Remove a timereport from PlanMill

                                                                        Secured by oauth_2.0

                                                                        PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

                                                                        • Request
                                                                        • Response

                                                                        URI Parameters

                                                                        • id: required (string)

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                                                                          See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                                                                          nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                                                                          timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                                                                          signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                                                                          Example:

                                                                          user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
                                                                        • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                                                                          Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                                                                          Example:

                                                                          EUR

                                                                        HTTP status code 204

                                                                        No HTTP body returned

                                                                        HTTP status code 400

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

                                                                        HTTP status code 401

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

                                                                        HTTP status code 403

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

                                                                        HTTP status code 404

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

                                                                        HTTP status code 429

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        HTTP status code 500

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

                                                                        /timereports/{id}/meta get

                                                                        Get meta information for the updatable fields of the timereport

                                                                        get

                                                                        View details of single meta

                                                                        get /timereports/{id}/meta

                                                                        View details of single meta

                                                                        Secured by oauth_2.0

                                                                        PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

                                                                        • Request
                                                                        • Response

                                                                        URI Parameters

                                                                        • id: required (string)

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                                                                          See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                                                                          nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                                                                          timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                                                                          signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                                                                          Example:

                                                                          user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
                                                                        • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                                                                          Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                                                                          Example:

                                                                          EUR

                                                                        HTTP status code 200

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "amount": {
    "caption": "Quantity",
    "format": "double",
    "values": null
  },
  "start": {
    "calendar": "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ",
    "caption": "Start",
    "format": "string",
    "values": null
  },
  "totalReported": {
    "caption": "Total reported",
    "maxlength": "512",
    "values": null
  },
  "project": {
    "link": "users/2834510/reportableassignments",
    "values": null
  },
  "billableStatus": {
    "values": null
  },
  "requireBillableComment": {
    "values": null
  },
  "remainingAmount": {
    "caption": "Remain",
    "maxlength": "512",
    "values": null
  },
  "billableAmount": {
    "caption": "Billable",
    "format": "double",
    "values": null
  },
  "task": {
    "caption": "Task / Assignment",
    "values": {
      "-": "-1"
    },
    "link": "users/2834510/reportableassignments"
  },
  "billingComment": {
    "caption": "Invoice comment",
    "maxlength": "512",
    "values": null
  },
  "person": {
    "values": null
  },
  "finish": {
    "calendar": "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ",
    "caption": "Finish",
    "format": "string",
    "values": null
  },
  "comment": {
    "caption": "Comment",
    "maxlength": "512",
    "values": null
  },
  "id": {
    "values": null
  },
  "status": {
    "values": null
  }
}

                                                                        HTTP status code 400

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "message": "ID in GET request URI was malformed",
  "code": "00003"
}

                                                                        HTTP status code 401

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "message": "Nonce too old",
  "code": "00401"
}

                                                                        HTTP status code 403

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "message": "Timer is not allowed to go over 24h! Rounding it down.",
  "code": "00403"
}

                                                                        HTTP status code 404

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "message": "Item not found",
  "code": "00404"
}

                                                                        HTTP status code 429

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        HTTP status code 500

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • Content-type: required (string - default: application/json;charset=UTF-8 )

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Example:

                                                                        {
  "message": "Invalid date pattern",
  "code": "00500"
}

                                                                        /users

                                                                        Collection of available users in PlanMill. See users/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

                                                                        /users get post

                                                                        get

                                                                        Get a list of users. See users/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

                                                                        post

                                                                        Add a new user to PlanMill or update existing (if id is given). See users/meta for list of columns and formats

                                                                        get /users

                                                                        Get a list of users. See users/meta for list of filters, columns and formats

                                                                        Secured by oauth_2.0

                                                                        PlanMill supports OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests. More information about it in the security part of the documentation.

                                                                        • Request
                                                                        • Response

                                                                        Headers

                                                                        • x-PlanMill-Auth: required (string)

                                                                          See section Authentication for examples and changes user: user's PlanMill id number (see "My page")

                                                                          nonce: unique string value for each request sent to same resource for same timestamp (60s tolerance) and same user's id and authkey. Its length should be 4-8 characters

                                                                          timestamp: time when request was sent (must match API servers time within 60s accuracy), in epoc format

                                                                          signature: hmac-SHA256 encrypted secret, calculated for every request based on base-64 encryption of user's id, timestamp and nonce

                                                                          Example:

                                                                          user:1234567;nonce:8usfNOfr;timestamp:1407834635;signature:1JR2KeTuJGNMdZr+Piys3PXoMnRW9AsTjcAaFo/MF9A=
                                                                        • x-PlanMill-Currency: (string - minLength: 3 - maxLength: 3)

                                                                          Recommended to be given. If currency not given in request header, user's current currency set in user settings is used. ISO code of currency in which money values should be shown or saved. Applies to all money attributes of the object, but may be converted by backend to the object specific currency. Some objects and their attributes may not care about the given currency but use the object's own currency

                                                                          Example:

                                                                          EUR

                                                                        Query Parameters

                                                                        • rowcount: (integer - minimum: 1)

                                                                          It limits the result set amount to the specified limit to avoid API call to return too many records. Default row count is 100

                                                                        • nextrows: (integer)

                                                                          The number of the next starting row. It is dependent on rowcount. For example, for total 250 items, if rowcount is 100 and nextrows is 101, it return items 101-201

                                                                        • order: (integer)

                                                                          Orders the results in ascending or descending order. 0=Ascending and 1=Descending. It is used in combination with sort

                                                                        • sort: (string)

                                                                          Sorts the results using string that is a JSON attribute

                                                                        • account: (integer)

                                                                          Id of account of a user

                                                                        • team: (integer)

                                                                          Id of the team which a user belongs to

                                                                        • type: (integer)

                                                                          Type of a user

                                                                        • role: (integer)

                                                                          Id of a role of a user

                                                                        • city: (string)

                                                                          City of a user

                                                                        • country: (string)

                                                                          Country of a user

                                                                        • superior: (integer)

                                                                          Id of superior of a user

                                                                        HTTP status code 200

                                                                        Body

                                                                        Type: application/json

                                                                        Schema:

                                                                        {
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "description": "base schema for all user entities",
  "oneOf": [
    {
      "type": "array",
      "items": { "$ref": "#/definitions/userArray" }
    },
    {
      "$ref": "#/definitions/userSingle"
    }
  ],
  "definitions": {
    "userSingle": {
      "type": "object",
	  "required": ["lastName", "account", "userName", "role"],

        "id": {
          "type": "integer",

      "type": "object",
	  "additionalProperties": false,
      "properties": {
		  "id": {
          "type": "integer",
          "description": "Internal ID of a user"
        },
        "firstName": {
          "type": "string",
          "maxLength": 80,
          "description": "First name of a user"
        },
        "lastName": {
          "type": "string",
          "maxLength": 80,
          "description": "Last name of a user"
        },

          "type": "integer",
          "description": "User status can be active or passive"
        },

          "type": ["integer", "null"],
          "description": "Enumeration of contract type of the user. 0=Permanent - full-time, 2=Permanent - part-time, 3=Trainee, 4=Subcontractor, 5=Army leave, 6=Study leave, 7=Maternity/Paternity leave, 8=Hired - full-time, 9=Hired - part-time, 10=Hired - temporarily, 11=Partner, 12=Customer, 13=Board"
        },
        "userName": {
          "type": ["string", "integer"],
          "maxLength": 255,
          "description": "Username of a user"
        },
        "account": {
          "type": [ "integer", "null"],
          "description": "Id of user's account"
        },
		"accountName": {
          "type": [ "string", "null"],
          "description": "Name of user's account"

          "type": ["string","null"],

          "type": ["integer", "null"],
